name: Lash Waterproof Volumizing Mascara
about: What it is:.What it does:.What it is formulated WITHOUT:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: Water, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyvinyl Acetate, Isododecane, Methyl Trimethicone, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Butylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Peg-8 Diisostearate, Bentonite, Rhodochrosite Extract, Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract (Rosa Centifolia), Sodium Dehydroacetate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Isostearice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i've been using this mascara on and off for the last few years and love it! it's my go to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Been my go-to for 15years, I'm always amazed this product hasn't blown up on TikTok. My holy grail mascara

reviews.review_title: Do not recommend it , dry and doesn’t hold up lash
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the price I won’t recommend this Mascara. Is the worst. It doesn’t hold my lashes up after curling and came kinda dry.  Im very disappointed and upset because it was expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mascara for years, it’s always my go to and the second they make a travel size I’ll be buying it. It doesn’t clump, it comes off easily with makeup remover, and it never smudges under my eyes. I’ve tried other mascaras over the years but nothing compares.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to and expected to like this product because I love other Buxom products, but I think this is one of the worst mascaras I have ever used. It chips off and leaves powdery smudgy spots under my eyes while applying and is horrible to remove. Washing my face twice and there is still mascara residue on my eyelashes, in my eyes and under my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Used it for many years. My job has me working outside and sometimes my eyes can water in the sun/wind. This mascara never budges or smudges!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gets very powdery the longer you use it. I do not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I been trying to look for a waterproof mascara ￼for while and this is not it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed. Weighs my lashes down so much no matter how much i curl them and makes them look clumpy. Not for me, expensive for no reason. Drugstore is waaayyy better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love Love Love! Pair this with the big ego by Tarte or alone, literally so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I keep coming back to this one. It never flakes or makes me look like a raccoon after a few hours. I can’t believe that some people don’t like this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this on a random whim, I needed a waterproof mascara really fast. Now I use it everyday. It doesn’t go anywhere but removes seamlessly. Lengthens and distributes beautifully, and holds the curl.

reviews.review_title: Literally the best waterproof mascara of life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You could run ten miles in this mascara and get no transfer or running. It's not the most lengthening mascara in the world, but it's so worth the trade-off to get something truly waterproof and transferproof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin long and straight eyelashes. I struggle with most mascaras being too heavy and just weighing my lashes back down straight after curling them. This mascara stays all day without flaking or smudging, and allows my lashes to stay lifted after curling.. my new fav

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so happy when they came out with a waterproof version, but it’s not waterproof at all. I LOVE the buxom brush head, and I wish more than anything they could truly make it waterproof. This formula is the exact same as the regular one.

reviews.review_title: BRÛLE LES YEUX !! Burns the eyes !! Careful ***
reviews.review_text: J'utilise ce mascara depuis au moins 1 mois. À TOUS LES JOURS, une petite miette me va dans les yeux et me fait larmoyer/brûler les yeux au point de devoir arrêter l'auto sur le bord de la route si je conduis. De plus, l'effet n'est pas aussi wow que je me m'attendais. Décevant... Je n'ai rien  reçu en échange de cette situation :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing mascara! It separates my lashes really well and doesn't flake either! 10/10 recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this in store as I ran out of mascara, and I loved their lip glosses. It's definitely waterproof and works really well for length and volume but by the end of the day I was having to clean black flecks of it off my cheeks and under eye. Love it for the grunge looks but if you're trying to keep a clean look, warning it flakes abit

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This doesn’t really do much for my lashes. I’m kind of your basic mascara. When I use an eyelash comb a bunch flakes off, but if I add more I usually need to run a comb through it, it’s just a viscous cycle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this during a holiday sale and the first time I put it on, I wasn't happy with it. But......I kept working with it and found that if I twist the brush just the right way, it gives my lashes amazing curl and lift. If you're in a hurry when putting on your makeup, this may not be the product for you but if you have time to work with it, the end results are nice. I didn't experience any flaking or smearing at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a suggestion in store. It clumps and flakes and most of the mascara goes to the root rather than spreading on the lash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I opened the tube for the first time and used it, the mascara was dry and had that really old feeling (my niece has been using the same tube of mascara for 2+ years, and that's how this mascara feels, really dry and old). The first coat darkens the lashes, but otherwise, I couldn't tell that I was wearing the mascara. I had to apply three coats in order to notice any volumizing, but it was so clumpy. When I combed them out, it was back to the results that I had after one coat, and when I tried to add another coat, it was a clumpy mess. I can't remember trying a worse mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my HG mascaras. I had bought it originally as I needed a waterproof mascara for vacation. I originally thought it was just okay and used it as a waterproof option when needed. That was 4 years ago and I have continued to repurchase time and time again. It makes my lashes look amazing, and I NEVER have to worry about it smudging or flaking. I can comfortably wear it for my 10-12hours shifts and not worry about transfer. I wouldn't say its the most voluminizing mascara ever, but it does make my lashes look great. Lengthened and never clumpy. I will routinely use this wand to brush out my lashes after I use another mascara because it just makes them so perfect. I will always have one of these at home.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 0 volume added, dont waste ur money. very natural and clumps

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this mascara for years. I recently switched to waterproof because I’ve had some issues with my eyes. I have poker-straight light blonde eyelashes so I heat curl my lashes, let them cool, and then apply 2-3 coats of this. They stay curled and full all day with no flaking and no raccoon eyes. No amount of sweating or rain makes them budge, but it removes with makeup remover very easily. I’ve tried all of the other mascaras but I keep coming back to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was really disappointed with this mascara. I was expecting more. Yes, it is waterproof. But it is clumpy, flaky, does not hold a curl. Gives your lashes the spidery look. I wouldn't recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this overtop of the Lancôme eyelash primer. The two together look really nice. So far I haven’t noticed much clumping and it holds a curl well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: No clumping, separate lashes, really waterproof, best mascara that I have been using for years

reviews.review_title: Elevated version of the Bloom by Covergirl mascara
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been a big fan of the bloom mascara for many years by cover girl, but I was looking for something a little more nourishing and dramatic for my lashes that still had the same type of lash brush. This one is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just ok, not blown away by the formula or effect. It is waterproof though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My eyelids get a bit oily over the course of a day, and despite trying many drugstore waterproof mascaras it always seems to smudge and give me raccoon eyes by the middle of the day. Glad I splurged on this mascara as I do not have that issue using it! I was apprehensive of the applicator first but it's nice at separating lashes and really gives it nice volume and lift. Worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favourite mascaras. I hate getting spider lashes and this avoids that. It adds length without looking tacky or clumpy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Don't understand the high reviews.  This did nothing.  More than any other mascara in my life, this left my lashes limp, straight, dead.  Also gave me racoon eyes even though it's waterproof.  I actually misplaced it somewhere, maybe it fell out of my makeup bag at work or something.  I went searching for it and then realized, I don't care that it's missing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got the wrong one, but this is really good stuff like and would get again

reviews.review_title: perfect for my long and straight lashes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have long, straight lashes and this mascara works great for them! it didn't clump at all, and it lasts very long on my lashes. i have worked out in it and there was no smudging, and i have gone through whole work days and it has stayed on and hasn't smudged. definitely one of my favorites and i will repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed. Hands down one of my fav wp mascaras and has been my go-to for ages.
Makes my lashes look flawlessly flirty and stays on even after a 10 hour shift!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for years and find myself always going back to this after a while, or at least  alternating back to it. It gives good length and last separation. The brush is easy to use and it’s not very messy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best mascaras I’ve tried. It gives amazing length without needing multiple coats and it makes your lashes looking natural.  No spider lashes or giant clumps! I’m a fan for life

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Clumpy and dried out; felt like I needed to use a lot of coats to get any kind of volume or depth and it ran ALOT - not ideal for the summertime

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Cannot recommend this mascara enough. The only mascara I’ve tried that stays put. No running. No smudging. No flaking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m very confused. I have used this mascara for years. I have very long straight lashes and need a waterproof mascara to hold the curl (after I curl my lashes). This was the one for me! Added length and volume and kept my curl all day. But my latest bottle is totally different. My lashes go limp almost immediately. Has there been a formula change?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have pin straight lashes and have to curl my lashes before applying mascara. Despite being waterproof, this mascara cannot keep my lashes curled. Immediately after applying, my lashes are flat and straight. Pretty disappointing since even drugstore waterproof mascaras can hold the curl. For this reason, I won't be re-purchasing. Besides that, it is smudge-proof, clump-free, and very long lasting, so if your lashes are naturally curled, you'll love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re looking for a natural looking mascara then this is your holy grail. It absolutely is not clumpy, it lengthens and defines, all the lashes appear separate and natural; but if you want a thickening or volumizing mascara then look elsewhere. I’ve seen reviews where people said it flakes or smudges but I have never had this happen, and I have oilier skin. Have worn during workouts and it doesn’t budge, even if I rub my eyes it doesn’t flake or smudge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know how often I have repurchased this mascara but it’s been a lot.  It separates and lengthens the lashes. It does not dry and flake off, stays all day and is waterproof, but is easily removed with makeup remover or a oil based cleanser (2-step method is great!!!) it is not very thickening, however on days I want an extra load of oomph, I use a volume mascara with fluffy brush first and then follow up with this one to separate those clumps. Tried other formulas, brands and brush types, but nothing else comes close. THIS. IS. THE. ONE! (…for me anyways lol)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed. I have small eyelashes and this mascara does not help them with volume nor length.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The only mascara that I will ever use!!  The problem I always have is my eyelashes is naturally straight and once curled, any other mascara will just make it straight again but not this one! Of course it starts getting clumpy once it's near the end but that helps make my lashes thicker I find :)  Recommend 100%

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I always end up coming back to this mascara no matter how many I try! It separates and lengthens my lashes without getting clumpy or looking like spider legs and lasts all day. It’s like a step up from a “your-lashes-but-better” kind of mascara and I love it <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this mascara but it was disappointing. It looks good when initially applied but by the end of the day is all flaked off with just trace amount left at base of lashes.

reviews.review_title: it’s ok but not for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this product, but since using other mascaras it really didn’t hold up to the hype it used to. I have short lashes and this product felt heavy and made my lashes less curled with its weight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: C’était le premier produit que j’ai acheté sur Sephora et malgré que je veux essayer des nouvelles choses, je reviens toujours vers ce mascara. J’aime que ce soit pas trop intense à la première application et que tu peux décider de l’intensité toi même

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this mascara but it flakes off a LOT and always ends up under my eyes. It may as well not be waterproof as I have black specks all under my eyes after a workout. I thought maybe it was just me because I run/work out a lot but I noticed even after going for a walk with my dog, it ends up under my eyes. This is the most disappointing “waterproof” mascara I’ve ever had, to be honest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The mascara is good/ok, as Buxom usually is (hence 3 stars), but it is not the typical waterproof at all. It might not smear or smudge, but it flakes RIGHT off. It does not hang on to the lashes even as well as the non-waterproof Buxom does. So... ok for not giving you raccoon eyes, but it leaves flakes within hours, whether or not water is involved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful, natural, and VERY long wearing. This absolutely does not budge no matter what and is difficult to take off (which can be both good and positive)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This worked great for me… love the application. Not too thick or dramatic

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping this waterproof mascara by Buxom might just be the mascara that wouldn't flake. It flakes almost immediately after putting it on. Don't waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. I have used it for years but it's no longer waterproof. I get a tear or sweat a little, and I have black all under my eyes. Still good at volumizing and separating every lash while extending length, but the waterproof thing is annoying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this lengthens and separates lashes. It doesn’t budge or fall and gather under my eyes and can look very natural. 4 stars because it can be hard to get off- I’ve only found 1-2 products that gets it fully off. It sometimes feels extra stiff/crunchy (if that makes sense?) if you put too many layers on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a very clumpy formulation, even straight out of the packaging. I’ve tried this product on a couple occasions and have never been pleased with the consistency. Also, the pigment is very weak. I have blonde lashes, and the pigment barely shows up even on my light colored lashes. The only redeeming quality for me is it really is quite waterproof. I went into the pool wearing it and it didn’t smudge or drip or flake off at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually buy waterproof mascara because there’s no other way my lashes stay curled. This one does not work for that purpose. The brush is great! But I wouldn’t purchase again because the formula is soooo flaky

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never written a review before, but this mascara deserves it. I have oily skin and long eyelashes so most mascaras smudge in a matter of hours, but not this one. My favourite makeup product ever!

reviews.review_title: BIBLE OF MASCARAS! buy it now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite mascara! I’ve tried them all. This one lifts and colonized every individual lash. It doesn’t get chunky with debris. The waterproof version stands the test of time and is smudge proof yet easily removable with just micel water. Highly recommend you won’t regret it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara! Bobbi brown waterproof mascara was my favourite, but they were out of stock, so I wanted to try another popular waterproof mascara that wasn't as expensive. Just wore it all day, in hot humid weather, no flaking, or transfer at all. Great lash separation, volume and good length too! Even better than Bobbi brown, which didn't have half as much length. My new favourite mascara ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The waterproof formula didn't hold a curl in my lashes. It held it halfway I say.  While the formula dried down I could see them straightening out.   So I guess this would be okay for wearing with fake lashes? Not on its own.  I have drugstore mascaras perform alot better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Is not waterproof, gave me raccoon eyes in a couple of hours. Didn’t hold my curls either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my fav mascaras! Brush helps to separate & lift lashes

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample a few times from Sephora. My lashes look nice with this style brush, it gives length. But I wouldn’t call this waterproof. At all. 2 hours in, 1 yawn and this mascara starts bothering my eyes, a lot. And it gets all over the top of my lid once it’s wet. No bueno.

reviews.review_title: Awesome Waterproof Mascara - my go-to mascara
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a big fan of this waterproof mascara. My eyes are a bit deep-set and I have transfer issues with lots of mascaras - not this one! I recommend it to my friends and family when they are looking for a great mascara. It can look relatively natural or you can build for a more dramatic look.

reviews.review_title: I was surprised how much I liked this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had pretty low expectations but wearing a mask with my regular mascara just wasn’t working so I got this. I took it for a test wear while I went for a super long nature walk while wearing a mask the whole time. Not a single smudge! I was amazed!! I do find my eyelashes go flat after awhile but I don’t know if that’s because of the product or because when I wear a mask my lashes get damp. Not as good as my normal mascara but I’m very happy with this and highly recommend as far as waterproof mascaras go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very waterproof and I love the brush, but this product flakes and the flakes really hurt when they get in your eye. I think it flakes more when it gets wet too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this stuff stays when you want and leaves when you don’t! It stayed on and I have very oily skin, cried thru a movie and it was still there! At the end of the day it came off with Sephora’s waterproof make up remover. Highly recommend 10/10 for waterproofing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Completely useless - didn't even look like I was wearing mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favourite mascara! I used to have the Tarte Camera Lashes Action one, but made the switch as this one offers volume AND lenght! It is not clumpy and easy to wash for a waterproof mascara! 10/10 would recommend for anyone who wants a full set of lashes that last all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally ordered Tarte lights camera splashes but wasn't impressed.  This is 100% better.  no clumps and looks great.  I've been trying to find my go to waterproof mascara and finally found. it!

reviews.review_title: The BEST waterproof mascara on the market
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried EVERY waterproof mascara on the market. Dior show, Tarte, Lancôme, Better Than Sex... you name it, I’ve tried it. They all do not work, except BUXOM! I wear contacts and have terrible allergies so my eyes water often. EVERY other waterproof mascara does not stay put, and I used to have to carry Q-tips in my purse to clean up the mascara run daily. Not with Buxom! In NYC I am ASTONISHED that some Sephora stores don’t carry this brand in store. It is hands-down, no questions asked the absolute best waterproof mascara on the market. For me, this has lasted ALL DAY on the beach, in pools, on hikes, skiing, surfing, running a marathon, and sadly at funeral services. Yes really, not even a flake or the slightest mascara run. Dior Show and other top brands ran immediately just from contact lens rewetting drops.   I do have naturally long eyelashes and this mascara makes them bigger and bolder. Much of it has to do with the shape of the wand. I just love it and this is a permanent staple in my makeup bag. If this is ever discontinued I know I’ll never find another mascara as good as this because I’ve literally tried them all, even the drug store brands. You can’t go wrong with this. Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This brand has been my go to for some time now and all I can say is I have never found anything better! I've used plenty of mascara in my time and this one is the only one I can find gentle enough on my eyes I can use this everyday and the wand makes it so easy to apply i love everything about thisss!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. Both the waterproof and regular versions. It defines lashes softly while also volumizing them. Buildable. This mascara is perfect for soft-to-medium levels of mascara. Sometimes I layer with a thicker mascara on the outer lashes, but usually I wear this one on it's own. I have repurchased before and definitely will again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Water proof I guess yes. But it smudges under my eyes just while working (I’m a hairstylist) I’ll stick my my ilia limitless lash

reviews.review_title: If this gets discontinued, makeup is dead to me!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, let me start this out by saying I am allergic to so many toxic and reactive ingredients that get put in makeup. I can't wear anything with carnauba wax (natural, but known irritant for causing dermatitis and does so on me), synthetic wax of any kind, mineral oil, all acrylate copolymers (acrylics will turn my eyes into swollen golfballs - it will be a trip to the emergency room), and all of these ingredients. Are. In. EVERY. mascara. known. to. Womankind!!! You know what I can use? Candilla wax, beeswax... that's about it. This is the only, the ONLY, mascara that I can put near my eyes. Every other brand puts known irritants in their formulations. Even the all natural ones use carnauba, which wrecks absolute havoc on my eyes. (Kosas, you would be perfect, but alas, you use cheap carnauba wax over candilla wax.) Omitting beeswax is I guess vegan, but when it's one of two waxes my eyes can handle? The cosmetic industry needs a serious overhaul.  Maybe one day I'll create my own mascara, but until then, this is all I can wear, and it's beautiful, clump-free, and waterproof! Oh my god, does it stay put! But at the end of the day, my Garnier micellar water takes it right off.  I would be lost without this. Please, Buxom, NEVER get rid of this formula. This isn't just my Holy Grail, it's my Only Grail. I love you, Buxom, for making a mascara for allergy-prone, sensitive eye girls like me. I would have given up on makeup a long time ago without you.

reviews.review_title: Will withstand a day in sea water!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Will withstand a day in sea water, no joke! I have used this mascara on more than one trip south in humid islands.  I put this on every morning when on vacation when i know i’ll go in the water.  I can’t bare not having mascara on.  I swim and snorkel in and out an entire day without ever having racoon eyes and to the envy of my friends, still had most of my mascara on at the end of the day.  As i said i don’t like to have no mascara on and this has been my go to for vacation as i can’t stand staying on the beach or not getting under water as i’m an active person.  I do layer this on to get thick volume as i do with the non waterproof Buxom as well.  I find that this is the only waterproof mascara that goes on as well as the non waterproof version (they usually get cakey and dry quickly) With this one you can “add layers after layers”, as many as you want depending on the look you desire.  It doesn’t clump or dry to a crisp.  Also another + is that the texture and workability of the formula doesn’t change (no thickening or drying) after weeks of usage day after day, so it feels like new even after a few weeks you have been using it.  I wanted to weite a review because i have tested this on several scuba diving / snorkeling trips and it’s absolutly amazing!  As for the removal, after an entire day swimming in the sea, i can use only baby shampoo to remove it in the shower. If i have not been in the sea, a waterproof remover is necessary.

The brush is a little larger than I am used to but it is easy to use and manipulate into the smallest corners and tiniest lashes.

reviews.review_text: While the product makes my eyelashes look great, they keep a curl

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great product, lengthen lashes and is waterproof.  One of my must haves - don't leave home without it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like it as it really held up well to water and the bit of oiliness around my eyes.  It took all of a minute to get the hang of the brush (by the 2nd application).  It does flake a bit,  adds a bunch of thickness,  not much in the length as far as I could tell.  I’ll be keeping it as a backup but I certainly wouldn’t dissuade others from purchasing it.  It’s a matter of personal preference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way this mascara looks. My lashes are very full but still very separated. My only complaint is that it's not as smudge proof as I would expect from a water proof formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Did not keep my lashes curled they automatically went back straight

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. My real lashes aren’t very long or full. Really lengthens and defines my lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this mascara for forever, and I don't plan on changing anytime soon. Makes my lashes look so sexy with very minimal work. I buy the waterproof kind, which is tricky to get off, but if I double cleanse I'm good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! My go to mascara! Haven’t found anything to top this yet! Won’t clump, or flake EVER!!! Love that it’s waterproof so I can wear it during my son’s swimming class (have to be in the water with him). Goes on smooth, stays on all day and it looks great on me. Have bought over and over again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a long-time user of Buxom and the non waterproof mascara so was I unpleasantly surprised when I tried the waterproof version. I had read good reviews and thought to try it out. The mascara was dry, clumpy and flaky from the very first use. I’ve never even had a drugstore mascara do this. It was not easy to apply and looked awful when I did. Will not purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the wand, but it gets flakey after a few hours of wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't love nor hate this mascara I think it's an okay one but I specifically purchased it because it claimed to be Waterproof when it's not at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is so flaky after about 2 weeks and does not make the lashes look longer!! Pieces fall in my eye all day long!! So itchy and irritating as well as hard to apply. Don’t waste your money.

I asked my bff who works at Sephora which mascara I needed next and she automatically said this one. And she wasn’t wrong. I can do one coat of this for a natural but awake look or I can apply multiple coats when I’m going for a more beat look. No matter what I do it doesn’t clump and they just get longer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this based on the rave reviews, but have been unimpressed. The formula strikes me as too thin, and it seems like I'm almost out of product even though I've used it less than, like, 10 times. It doesn't give me the volume I would like. It does do a good job of lengthening the lashes, just not plumping them. I doubt I would buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara sadly does not hold a curl. I have very straight lashes and use waterproof to hold the curl, however as I brushed the wand through my lashes it immediately straightened my lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Truly love this mascara. I had been using L’Oréal lash paradise because it was a dupe for too faced better than sex. But I received this in a sample size and fell in love with it. It deliverers on everything you want in a good mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been trying so many mascaras within the past years . I’m finally hooked with Buxom! The brush and formula are amazing, they work so perfectly together and make my lashes look beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm writing this after a month of use. At first it was amazing thick beautiful lashes. Great waterproof formula. But I noticed it clumping the other week and now it just a clumpy mess. Too bad now I'm reverting back to my Lancôme

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEST waterproof I have used! I wear contacts and this does not bother them. It doesn't flake or crumble. I have tried most of the big brands and can honestly say, Buxom does it the best...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara, it's the only one I ever use anymore. Its perfect and reliable! I never have issues with it chunking up on me. Its also a great base for drama, sometimes I put this on, and it dries quickly, then I'll do a second quote of a volume Mascara like my Dior... and it works great for some drama without the headache of falsies! I haven't purchased any other mascara besides this brand in two years, I'm in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Needed a waterproof without beeswax (allergy). This did the trick! It separates my lashes nicely and hangs on all day! Wish it was a bit more dramatic, but it doesn’t budge so I can’t be too disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample and fell in love. This formula makes each lash defined and gorgeous! I have repurchased several times and hope this company doesn’t change a thing!! Love, love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this mascara! I have been using it for at least 7 years. It is extremely waterproof while not being too difficult to remove. This is a must have product for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love this mascara, been using it for years! seperately and lengthens, no clumping, no running but comes off completely with a makeup wipe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and have been using it ever since. It separates them really well and makes my lashes look natural. It doesn’t make them look longer unless I curl them, but I don’t mind that because they look natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara takes too long to build up and to top it off, it dried up too quick. I'd say it lasted about a month before I noticed the brush wasn't picking up as much product. I didn't like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Stays put, even with a long day! I'm not always a fan of this type of applicator but this one does a good job. No clumpies!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this formula! Not too wet, not too dry; and the wand is perfect for combing your eyelashes to the sky but without any clumping. Lasts all day but easy to remove at the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is really nice in terms of both length and volume. I curl my eyelashes because of how straight they are, and this mascara just won't hold that curl-they are back to stick straight in seconds!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara, long wearing and dorsn't smudge. Have bought it twice already. Great volume yet not chuncky. Will continue to purchase.

I bought this for a wedding I was attending this summer, and it was amazing! My lashes appeared so black and extremely long. Love that the brush really gets to all those tiny lashes and defines each and every one. It is the best waterproof mascara I have tried to date. Held up perfectly through the tears (there was a lot !) no smudged black lines on my face! I just wish the brush was a touch smaller to give a bit more control. Otherwise the product is A  quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara overall. Good formula and color.

This is my favorite mascara of all time. Better than everything I tried before and after buying this. It's the product I've been most loyal to in my whole makeup bag. It makes lashes longer, fuller and it's not clumpy. The waterproof is amazing and it's the blackest black... love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is awesome.  It is completely waterproof and still thickens my lashes.  The only reason I didn't give it a 5 is because by the end of the day it starts to flake off.  So you have to reapply.  Other than that its awesome.
This is my favourite mascara! I only have to apply one or two coats to get full, luscious lashes that last all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use Buxom mascara every day. It really shows off the length of your lashes and goes on smoothly. This waterproof version is fantastic at holding, it doesn't give raccoon eyes and stays put even on the longest lake days! The only down side is that it does stay on, sometimes even with my makeup remover. So the next day there are serval little clumps that I really have to remove before applying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got broken up with today and this stayed on through 5  hours of me crying.  Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: MY favorite mascara! I always get asked if I am wearing false lashes when I use Buxom.  I am obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Another makeup product I wish I had come across sooner...totally worth the price and it holds my lashes and lengthens them to such a degree!  If you're looking for a waterproof mascara, this is definitely the one to buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down this is The Best! I am an active lady, I wear many hats. But I only wear this mascara because it stays put, no flakes (same day), it makes my lashes full and long, but not so long they are leaving feathers up top.

reviews.review_title: Best waterproof mascara: long lasting, no clumping
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best waterproof mascara I have ever worn.  It doesnt clump on my lashes, and makes them look so long and plump.  It comes off easily with make-up remover, but stays on in water and even throughout the night.  I never wake-up with racoon eyes!

reviews.review_title: can't wait to get rid of it
reviews.review_text: So I got this originally in a sample and loved the small version. Bought the big tube and it is awful I mean if you have never worn mascara before it's probably fine but you have to put so many strokes on it feels no product comes from the brush to your lashes. I can't wait until I finish this to buy a new type ugh will not repurchase

That is a good waterproof mascara. My lids are oily so at the end if the day, i have a raccoon face. This mascara Do not smudge at all. I can wear it during work for 10 hours and i can sweat it will notre move nor smudge. Plus, it gives me great lashes.

Goes on fast, thick, and relatively non-clumping. Definitely waterproof and comes off easily with makeup remover. The brush is humongous - it applies the product to eyelashes well, but makes it easy for accidental skin contact.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Best waterproof mascara!  I live in Jacksonville, FL and although it gets pretty steamy here, this mascara doesn't smudge or run.   My lashes are pretty long but light colored and not thick.  This mascara helps define them without getting tarantula lashes.  Great for an everyday mascara or even in the water.    Comes off with a good facial cleanser or love Lancome bi-facil to quickly remove it if using a lighter cleanser.

I have been using Buxom mascara for at least 3 years. Every once and a while I decide to try something new. Each and every time I go back to this mascara. Recently purchased the waterproof for vacation and I loved it.
Perfect waterproof mascara!! Stays on during exercise and does not rub off or give raccoon eyes. Only downfall is it is very hard to get off without the proper remover, but it's worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. One coat is all you need for big full lashes. People always compliment and ask what I use. It's not cheap, but you won't regret this purchase.

I cant deal with this mascara! I've been using it for about a month and a half and it is not working for me at all :( I use waterproof mascara to help with the black fading under my eye but this is black as night in my under eye within an hour or two! SO DISAPPOINTED!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: great mascara, is fully waterproof and doesnt smudge at all. i love the applicator and wish that all mascaras came with such a wand, i allows for easy,even and clump-free application. would definitely recommend

reviews.review_title: Stays put even on oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin, so most products make me look like a raccoon at the end of the day. This product did not budge! I saw maybe a flake or two at the end of my 12 hour day, but overall, I'm very pleased with this product. I love the brush shape and I didn't feel the need to put on multiple coats to get a good look. No clumping either. I'm not a fan of the price tag, but would definitely recommend this product, especially for those who want stay all day power!

I work outside in hot and cold weather. I love my make up but to find something that doesn't budge is amazing. This not only gives me the big lashes but doesn't run down my face even when I am sweating. Love this product!

reviews.review_title: exactly what I was looking for!
reviews.review_text: separates, elongates, darkens perfectly nothing crazy. love the wand perfect for everyday. awesome that its waterproof cause I cry a lot *100 emoji*
I'm picky with my mascara, but this one does the job! It has a great brush with multiple sizes for each and every lash. Layer it on or only do one, the results are great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This mascara worked so well with my oily eyes, I´ve been trying a lot of different mascara and none of them worked as well as this one! The waterproof one works so good and gives amazing volume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have short lashes and always hated it. I used all types of mascara that promised to make it look longer but never did. This one is my favorite of all times! It definitely makes my lashes look much longer!

This product is amazing doesn't clump and hold a curl it is my newest favorite mascara.. I've tried tarte and better than sex mascara this product is better. This also has my favorite type of brush so that's a bonus . Just don't wait too long if you're going to apply a second coat it dries fast but it does separate your lashes greatly:) I would buy this over and over again until I come across something that's even better but honestly doesn't get much better than this . Also this mascara doesn't run

this is the only mascara I have chosen to use for the past five years, I'm not kidding!! I have LOVED this mascara. It has the perfect brush for application to comb the eyelashes and elongate them. The color is perfect and so is the formula. I feel this mascara isn't as well known as it should be. I have tried many other more popular brands, but this is my tried and true. It's the one I always go back to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: On a seemingly neverending quest for a waterproof mascara that doesn't smudge and smear in a half hour, this may be a rare winner--but only when used with a primer. It also does not clump at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This mascara applies so easily and barely clumps, and it works great on my bottom lashes as well. I've cried twice in this mascara and it barely smears. It also lasts really long. One of my favorite mascaras

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've tried several waterproof mascaras as my eyes tear and this is the only one that doesn't smudge a lot. Some, yes, but not much. The best part is the mascara itself goes on lightly so you can control how heavy to apply. No more tarantula lashes. It's my first choice.
Love this mascara, it is the best mascara I own! I got it for free as a mobile offer and I'm going to order a fill size! It never clumps my lashes and give them so much VOLUME
I have tried virtually every waterproof mascara out there. I always come back to this.  The quality lasts till the end of the tube without clumping.  My favorite for at least 3 years
This is the only mascara I use, I absolutely love it. My only critique is that it dries out very quickly, I have to use contact solution drops every couple weeks to keep this working well

This mascara is everything!  It goes on a perfect shade of black and doesn't budge.  Not through working out, sobbing through weddings, or getting caught in the rain.  I've tried different mascaras, and always come back to this one.  It's my holy grail!

I have very straight lashes and therefore can only wear waterproof mascara if I want them to stay curled. I've tried my fair share of bad waterproof mascaras, but I've never had one not hold a curl until this one! My lashes fall flat within seconds of applying. After a few hours my lashes look bare. It didn't do anything for me volume- or length-wise, and it clumped together even when I tried combing my lashes out with a spoolie or one of those fine metal lash combs. Really disappointed in this mascara and will be returning. However, it did not flake or smudge at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: No it isn't perfect; the wand is too large and the brush could use more bristles which make it somewhat difficult to apply. Despite that, this is the ONLY mascara that doesn't smudge underneath my eyes! I have tried them all from drug store to department store to specialty brands and this is the only one to hold up to my oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This mascara had this best first impression ever for me! I've gone through so many different mascaras and this is the first to address all of my desires: waterproof, smudge proof, long lasting, lash separating, clump free, extremely black, easy to use. I have really dark and long lashes, but they just need a little help with grooming and this does the trick without making them look chunky. I love how smoothly this goes on my lashes and how smoothly the brush comes out of the tube without pulling out all kinds of chunks that need to come off! You'd think that all mascaras are easy to use, but sometimes the shape of the brush isn't right and I can't seem to catch the lashes correctly, but this hour-glass shaped brush seams to do the trick for me. Initially you might think that this goes on a little thin (which I love!), but it is build able to create some volume too. Lately I've been experimenting with a lot of makeup and skin care products at Sephora, but I think I'm done in the mascara department. I will be using and re-buying this until they stop producing it.

I've tried using other mascaras over the years but always come back to this. I even got my mother (who is a drug store only user for life) hooked on this! So thickening! The brush is large which I love for building volume.

I'm not sure why some ppl are getting a smudge issue with this mascara, but it works perfectly for me! I tried it after loving the original non waterproof, because I prefer a waterproof mascara! And it works so well, great brush and application. Not chunky, goes on smooth and add crazy volume! And unlike some cement like waterproof mascaras this one comes off with makeup remover well without having to nearly rip off your eyelashes. I would dry recommend this one! It dries quick and I had no smudging at all that other reviews mentioned. Love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: When I first applied this mascara, I was absolutely in love with the way my eyelashes looked. They looked separated, long, and voluminous. I thought that I had found the perfect mascara. Three hours later, I looked in the mirror at school and I thought I saw a Raccoon in the mirror. The mascara was smeared under my eye and on my eyelid. I then tried it the following day and was disappointed once again. I then tried it with the benefit brown eyelash primer and the mascara did not smudge as much but I would stay away from this mascara even if your eyelids are not oily if you want a mascara to last.
Ended up with racoon eyes a few hours after first applying it in morning. Disappointed it's not smudge-proof, as claimed. Also didn't like the brush. Too big.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this mascara out of recommendation from a Sephora employee.  I have very stubborn to curl lashes. I have to curl them and immediately use waterproof mascara in order to get my lashes to stay curled. If I don't use waterproof, within seconds of applying the mascara, my lashes are completely down turned.   I bought the waterproof formula and it does absolutely nothing for holding curl. My lashes lose all curl before I have even finished applying the mascara. The formula is way too wet and heavy.
I've never found a better mascara I love it so much it's always a perfect go to product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this is not waterproof at all. It smudges worse than some non-waterproof mascaras and you end up with raccoon eyes within a couple hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite mascaras. I have really long eyelashes and I like something that is volumizing without being too heavy and losing my curl. AND doesn't give you that terrible Tammy Faye spider lash look.  This defines the lashes nicely.

I only really use waterproof mascara so when I saw this with the this brush that looked like it would define my lashes really well I was excited.... BUT I do not like this product. Don't try curling your eyelashes with it because they will just go back to how they were, and if you try and apply it again it clumps.  Plus it only stays on thick for an hour or so then starts coming off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have extremely oily eyelids and it's hard to find even a waterproof mascara that doesn't give me raccoon eyes by the end of the day. Even Dior doesn't work. Makeup Forever worked waterproof wise but I didn't get any volume or length. I LOVE Buxom. It really is completely waterproof and my lashes look thick and long.

I used to consistently buy new mascaras always different from the last, in search of the perfect one. Finally I tried Buxom and haven't tried a new one since! I do one quick layer on the daily for work and on the weekends I add a few extra coats for a much more bold look. Tbh I sleep in it every once in a while and it seriously look 95% as good in the morning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I liked how this made my lashes look (bit of length, decent volume, holds a curl alright), however, it smudges under my eyes throughout the day. In all honesty all mascaras seem to do this to me, but I know there are others out there with the same problem.

This is one of the best mascaras that i've bought! It goes on super easy, comes off easily (I use coconut oil) but I do put 2 or more coats on because it goes on kind of thin. Would definitely recommend!
It does add a bit of volumn but really no big difference and was clumpy

reviews.review_title: used to love now not so sure
reviews.review_text: This is the second time I purchased this mascara, I even had a sample version before. Both times this mascara was great. I love the thick brush and the consistency doesn't feel too wet. It goes on easy and makes my lashes fuller. However this last one I brought seems to dry up and flake/smudge throughout the day. I don't recall this ever happening before. Not sure if they've changed the formula or I got one that was old. Would love the old formula back if that is the case. I have to get another one soon and might try one last time incase it is the formula.
I've tried this multiple times but it really does not do much for me and it is certainly not waterproof; it flakes off throughout the day
This may be the best waterproof mascara I've ever used. I get as much volume as I can without it being clumpy. It stayed on at the beach and in the pool while I was on vacation. Great purchase!

I love to use this in combination with another mascara because it tends to go on thin BUT it does not clump and looks beautiful on its own when multiple coats are applied. The applicator makes it so easy to apply to upper and lower lashes. The 4 star is for the viscosity of the formula.
It does exactly what it says it's going to.....lengthens, defines, separates, beautifies. No clumping at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes
reviews.review_text: Great price - this by far has been my go to brand for mascara especially the waterproof version.

I'm torn- this mascara is FANTASTIC for waterproof power, no smudging or flaking. (Yet comes off easily with gentle makeup remover.) It's lengthening and defines my lashes- no clumps. Love that. Doesn't hold the best curl, but also not the worst. My main gripe is that it has not added any volume to my lashes. I already have pretty long, dark eyelashes that hold a curl without mascara, so a product that just emphasizes that without adding volume doesn't do much for me personally. It also clumped up terribly when I tried it with false lashes for a photo shoot. I love the staying power and the smooth application & definition, but not sure I'll keep it as I really like to look like I have thicker lashes.
Everyone always thinks I'm wearing false lashes. The best mascara
You can literally wash your face and this will still be there, I get a ton of compliments when I wear it since it shows the length of my lashes beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I always am in search of the best waterproof mascara and I think I may have found it. Because of my asian eyelashes, I tend to get smudges on my eyelids and underneath my eyes. However, with this mascara, I rarely have to check if its smudging. It holds a curl, add volume, separates each lash and doesn't smudge. If that's what you're looking for, I would seriously recommend this mascara

I got this as a sample from my cousin, and loved how it looked on myself. I decided to buy waterproof (go big or go home mentality), and loved how long it stayed.  It holds the curls on my eyelashes, which is great since mine are fairly long.  Sometimes it clumps on the ends, but not always.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: It is a great product for the cost. It does not come off all day or smear like other products.
I have short straight lashes and this mascara made them lose their curl would not recommend

I thought this was a holy growl product. I had excellent results after the first application. I do like the way my lashes look, but this is not at all waterproof or smudge-proof. I don't even have this problem with regular mascara... would not recommend. I've had better wailed with drugstore waterproof mascara. Disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the brush, which coated all of my eyelashes smoothly and without clumps.  I also got great length out of the mascara. Unfortunately, it took less than a minute for the mascara to uncurl my lashes almost entirely. Instead of lifting my eyelashes and enhancing the curl, it destroyed it.  Disappointed that the quality of the mascara did not match the quality of the brush.

I have searched and searched for a mascara that was soft, easy to apply, and would hold a curl (rather than my lash falling flat by morning coffee) and this one delivered!! This is now my absolute favourite mascara! Can't live without it!!

this definitely does the trick and volumizes/holds a curl.  I use this with the japonesque eyelash curler and someone asked if I had on eyelash extensions:)  waterproof too, wore it all night for a halloween party and it didn't run at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am one of those people who is always looking for the PERFECT mascara, and I don't believe that it exists. That said, this is as close as it gets. I always keep a tube of this on hand, even when I am buying other mascaras to check and see if they're better. This lasts, don't smudge or run (and I a greasy around the eyes in live in a humid climate), and it makes my lashes look super long. Just wish it volumized more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I loved the original formula and wanted to try the waterproof. I love this one even more as it lasts all day long with no smudging. It goes on smooth, no clumps or lumps. It makes my lashes so huge and gorgeous! And... it really is waterproof. I ride bicycle to work in the cold fall and spring and my eyes water like crazy... but... the mascara stays on... hooray!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This mascara is amazing! Great staying power, easy application, never clumps, easy to layer, doesn't flake, fairly easy to remove. I bought a mascara sampler pack and this was by far the stand out winner. I'll never use another mascara, as long as this is around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: When I first apply this mascara it looks wonderful! BUT it does not last for the whole day. The other problem I have with it is that it feels like it flattens out my lashes, any curl from a curler falls after applying. It does volumes and define well though!
I bought this because I am obsessed with the original formula of the BUXOM lash.  Unfortunately the waterproof version is a relative dissapointment, but yes it is water proof.
I bought this because I wanted a waterproof mascara that holds a curl, but this just weighs them down after i curl them.
If you're looking for a waterproof mascara and nothing else, this is the one. The brush is great and separates each lash, no clumps. I would like a little more volume though.

reviews.review_title: Doesn't hold curl and has minimal to no volume
reviews.review_text: When I put this mascara on my curled lashes, the formula straightens them right out! The appearance of this mascara is also very minimal (not thick or dark). The brush is very nice but delivers very little product. If I didn't live overseas right now this would have gone straight back to Sephora. Sadly, for now it's a reminder of money wasted in my make up bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Great Mascara...just wish it made my lashes look a little fuller.

I've been using this mascara for probably over 5 or 6  years now and I haven't been able to find one to beat it. It's just amazing. I love the rubber applicator, never once got flaky or clumpy on me. It's 100% waterproof but then comes off so easily when I wash my face at night which I love because then I'm not damaging my eyelashes trying to rub it off every night. It washes away perfectly and you'll never get that black mascara running down you're face look, which I hate!

reviews.review_title: stays on through snorkeling and surfing
reviews.review_text: this stuff plus Sephora's waterproof liner and you're unstoppable.

This is the mascara I always come back to. It makes my lashes long, separated and they stay that way all day. I get unimpressed with this after a while and try other mascaras only to just buy this one again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This stuff is actually my favorite mascara on the market only the waterproof though because i sweat a lot and get oily. I have very large eyes that get irritated easy but this stuff does not run even if i have tears. And it's a lot of product....harder on the baby lashes though I don't recommend on baby lashes.

reviews.review_title: great brush but flakes after a long day
reviews.review_text: This is great mascara due to the consistency, curl factor and brush. However, I'm a girl that works for more than 12 hrs a day sometimes and I look for a product that will last the whole day. It has the tendency to flake and fall under your eyes after 8 hrs. As a result, I probably would not buy it again because of the price tag.

Loved the brush but when i bought it from the store and opened it up used it for the first time and didn't like it. First time using it it was dry and left clumps like if I had already opened it and didn't close it right or like it was old. Love Sephora but won't buy this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got this mascara bc I was going to Cuba that country is very hot so I need it a water proof mascara I saw all the reviews and I give it a try so didn't work the mascara started falling in my under eye. I will not recommend as a water proof
I bought this because ur is waterproof! it worked great and was actually waterproof. it stayed on all day even after swimming

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I never had great experiences with waterproof mascara actually doing their jobs but I'd see the review for buxom's and it works! It stays on all day, even with a wet formula, and it stands against my teary, teary eyes. It volumizes and lengthens without making my lashes so outrageous. My eyes tend to turn into a faucet on windy days, so it helps having this make my lashes look great and not worrying about black streaks on my face.

AMAZING! I love this mascara sooooo much! It lengthens,holds curl well and is waterproof and smudge proof! It isn't clumpy either. If your deciding whether or not to buy it,I would say go for it! It's on the inexpensive side for mascara and works well.Better than the Tarte mascara with the leather bottle.

I love this mascara with all my heart. Not only does it make my lashes look amazing, but the other day when my contact got something in it and my eyes started watering like crazy, the mascara didn't run or smudge. Perfection in a bottle.

It's hard for me to find a good mascara that doesn't smudge into raccoon eyes by the end of the work day. This is one that I highly recommend for nonsmudging, volume, and thickens. In addition to eyelash fibers that I bought at Sephora, this mascara gives the same appeal as fake lashes. The curl may not last however.
If you have sensitive skin or eyes I would highly recommend not purchasing this.  I did a lot of research for the purchase and it sadly disappointed because it made my eyes so incredibly itchy :(

It separates and lengthens my lashes nicely without clumping. I also like that it's a huge tube and wand. I don't think it's waterproof or smudge proof. I rubbed my eyes accidentally and I noticed that the mascara has also come off as well. I also did a shower test and it didn't last in the water.. maybe I shouldn't test it out in the shower but if it doesn't survive in the shower, it can't survive at a pool.
Did not volumize, hold curl or lengthen. In fact, the only thing it did was not smudge, but that's because it seemed like no product would transfer to my eyelashes. Disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This Buxom mascara is my all time favourite. This waterproof version it the perfect summer solution. The formula and wand are exactly the same as the original and they're a big reason why I love this product so much.

So I have purchased so so many different mascara's. Too faced, urban decay, you name it. I work 12 hours shifts 4 days a week an this is the only mascara to hold up and not leave me with raccoon eyes. Staple to my daily routine!!
I keep coming back to this mascara! Nothing else will do! This lasts all day and night. Never smears. Love it.

this stuff is great if you want super long natural looking curly lashes. It separates them and makes them EXTREMELY long and curly. However I prefer thicker lashes so the too faced waterproof one is my fav. The buxom formula is great though- very waterproof and doesn't crumble. To make sure it won't crumble- don't apply more than one layer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really like this mascara, hold up to swimming and spending the day at the beach. Sometimes does crumble but overall good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This Buxom mascara was everything I was looking for. I needed a daytime lash that provided length and definition but that didn't clump up. The brush curls and separates the leashes perfectly and the formula does no smudge throughout the day, even in the South Carolina heat!
This crumbled all over my face and transferred under my eyes. It didn't even make my lashes look good.

I have used high end mascaras like Dior, Giorgio Armani, and Givenchy. This Buxom mascara is just as good. It's very black. It thickens, lengthens, lasts all day. My favorite thing about Buxom is the brush. It picks up just the right amount of product so you don't get clumps. I can apply 3 coats without even reaching for a lash comb. I'm sort of surprised that more people don't know about this waterproof version. I think that the Sephora app doesn't have it coded correctly when you filter for waterproof mascaras.

This is a great waterproof mascara that does what it promises (it adds good length and thickness, doesn't smudge and has minimal flaking). It makes my lashes slightly crispy (like most waterproof formulas) but really has lasted all day, even when I got stuck in a rainstorm and my other makeup was running all over the place. My one qualm is the size of the brush, which requires some getting used to, especially on the lower lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this from my local store after reading some reviews and watching YouTubers rave about it. I think it is a great mascara. It separates your lashes and opens your eyes up. It does flake a bit by the end of the night. It doesn't seem to lengthen lashes, but does separate and make them appear dense. I enjoy this mascara and will by it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. No flaking. Lasts all day. Woterproof works well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: My eyes water a lot and I have tried out a number of waterproof formulas. Buxom is my favorite non-drugstore brand. It doesn't flake, amplifies without clumps and stays truly waterproof, even through a workout or a rainstorm.

reviews.review_title: Love It, Can't Live Without It
reviews.review_text: I was a huge fan of Buxom Lash Mascara even before I tried the waterproof version. I ended up switching to the waterproof formula when my mom dies last year and I knew I was going to need a good waterproof formula. I haven't looked back since - I have had days where I've cried for hours and you wouldn't be able to tell from my mascara. I'd highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I can't believe this stuff is so cheap. I've been layering it with BLINC on top, but it's a great formula on its own. Waterproof, volumizing, jet black. Love.

I never write reviews, but I felt this was necessary. I went white water rafting and of course needed my mascara. It poured raining and the boats were also throwing buckets of water at each other and the other woman in the boat turns to me shocked because my mascara was still on and not running at all. I was super impressed and would suggest it to anyone looking for a great mascara waterproof or otherwise!
it's better than my favorite better than sex super surprised by how the wand and formula of if! better than expected

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this mascara! It applies easily and stays on all day without flaking or smearing. Your lashes stay soft too.
I gave it one star otherwise I wouldn't have given it any stars.  This mascara isn't waterproof and it smudges. When you sweat it smudges.    It didn't use to. So I think they changed the formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Where has this mascara been all my life?  First and only complaint: it flakes somewhat. But what waterproof formula doesn't? They're little brush-away flakes, anyway, not the chunky smudges-on-your-face kind. Applying setting spray helps.  Best Feature: the wand! Comes out of the tube with a small (not too small) amount of product that allows you to build up coat-by-coat. I recently tried the Too Faced and Tarte waterproof formulas and they both failed big-time on this - way too much product. This mascara doesn't give me clumpy/spidery lashes. You can build drama in a way that still looks feathery and light, like false lashes. I'm usually averse to plastic bristles but this really does fan out the lashes well and does not poke the eye.  This mascara holds a curl on my extremely curl-resistant lashes. The formula isn't too wet or too dry. I really hate wet formulas that smudge and stick the lashes together before they dry - this is not at all like that.  Not too bad to take off compared to some waterproof - I find coconut oil and warm water work well! I definitely recommend!

I have tried them all- Better than sex, They're Real! and every mascara in between. I never expected to find the perfect mascara from a company known for their lipgloss. It separates, lengthens and adds buildable volume without clumping or flaking. No more layering 4 different brands together, no more piling on 8 coats. i seriously cannot say enough about this stuff!! TRY IT!
Great mascara!   Lengthens,  thickens, and doesn't clump.  Can apply a few coats without it getting gunky.   Easy to remove Even though it's waterproof.

I've tried lots of different brands (Dior, Kat vonD, benefit, etc) and keep coming back to Buxom. It volumizes, lengthens and doesn't clump. It doesn't last as long as Dior but I like the lash separation much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am not in love with it. It's not bad it just doesn't give much volume and that could be just cause it is new. I have only used it a few times. i will probably try something else though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Okay, so first of all, I love this mascara. It makes my eyelashes voluminous and longer, and they holds a curl pretty well too. I'm a hairstylist and by the end of a long day at work my mascara is usually smudging and looking all raccoon-like. Not with Buxom waterproof though! I even went swimming and it didn't budge, great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: finally a truly waterproof mascara and a brush that seperates and doesn't clump

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: It darkens my fair eyelashes but doesn't clump. It also lengthens them. And I like the big wand covering more area and giving me something I can grasp and guide better.

reviews.review_title: Adds a lot of length & a little volume.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive eyes & this is one of the few mascaras that doesn't bother me.  Lengthens & defines lashes very well.  Adds a little volume without clumping or looking really bulky.  Waterproof & fairly long lasting.  Lasts about 12 hours before it starts flaking just a little.  I curl my lashes before applying & it holds the curl very well.
It weighs down my lashes and doesn't hold a curl, clumps really badly if you try to curl it after applying. Waste of money.
