reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: The formula is too thick for my thin/straight lashes. While it does add some volume, it weighed my lashes down and wouldn't keep my lashes curled. The wand is also too big for me; not a fan.
I absolutely love this mascara! I consistently buy it. It lengthens but doesn't clump, I always get compliments about how good my lashes look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Probably one of my best water-proof mascaras. Love love love this buxom one. Went into the pool for about an hour and came out with no smudges and the mascara was still there. Highly recommend :)

I was looking for a waterproof mascara that I love and I found it on my first try! I have been using tarteist lash paint and I've been really liking it but I wanted something waterproof for summer. I like the way this makes my lashes look even better than tarteist. I wanted to see how well it lasted when wet so I just had my brother spray a bunch of water on my face and when I dried off with a paper towel nothing came off and then I looked in the mirror my lashes looked just as good as before. I think I will be sticking with this mascara even after summer.
Finally a mascara that does not go on clumpy and messy!  Lashes are defined!! Great mascara at a great price. Have tried many expensive samples and buxom beats them all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara, and I don't have to reapply during the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This mascara is great since it makes the lashes look natural and does not clump. However, I have stubborn straight eyelashes and so i did expect the waterproof formula to keep my lashes curled instead of weighing them down and uncurling them.

I bought this mascara with high hopes. I swim a lot and knew I needed to invest in a good waterproof for the summer. This stuff crumbles and falls off so much! I would rather continue buying my cheap e.l.f. mascara that's not even water resistant, for $6 than ever waste my money on this product again! I'm returning it.

I've been hunting for a new mascara ever since Urban Decay discontinued Lush Lash, and I've found it. It stays put and makes my lashes look great. Since I have fairly thick & long lashes, all I really need is color, so keep that in mind. I find that is washes off easily with my regular face wash, but it disolves in oil well, also. I like the small diameter of the brush and the gel formula; it's quick drying and the brush doesn't poke through to my eye lid. I'll be buying this again.
This is the best mascara I've found in a while!!  It's waterproof and does not run.  Every mascara I've ever had smudges because of my eye shape, this does not.  I'll definitely buy this again!

I am an eye makeup junkie. Even if I have no other makeup on my face I have at least mascara and eyeliner on, since I was in high school this has been my thing. And for years I have tried every brand Sephora has as well as drug store brands and yet I keep coming back to Buxom. I have naturally dark, longish lashes so I just needed some plump to them, this does the trick. All the others are clumpy and flatten after a few hours. Give me this and my Lancôme eyeliner and I'm good to go :)

This was bad straight out of the box but I'll start with the pros: it is waterproof and smudge proof. Cons: clumpy and the clumps are dang hard to comb out; does literally nothing for volume or length, in fact it made my lashes all spidery; and even perfectly prepped and curled lashes fall flat almost immediately. Pretty much does only one thing well, would not recommend.
I love this mascara. The black is blackest black. It stays on very well! I just wish the brush were a little fuller.
I always have a problem with my mascara running and this has been the best I have found so far to prevent it. It will still run a little, but not like all of the others I have tried

I bought this on a whim because I was going to Miami for the weekend...I love the non-waterproof formula of this mascara, its my holy grail mascara. This waterproof version was so hard to remove & a ton of my lashes came out during the removal process. Not happy. I will stick to the regular formula from now on. Lesson learned.
I am still on the quest to find a waterproof mascara that does not smudge.  This one looks great and is really a rich dark black but smudged on me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am not a waterproof fan...but as summer approaches it becomes a necessary item. I am a Dior fan for my regular mascara but don't like their waterproof version. After reading reviews I decided to try Buxom. I have never used their mascara before but I really like this. It made my lashes long and thick without clumps and it didn't shed as a lot of others do. Definitely recommend it

reviews.review_title: If you have hooded eyes, this mascara is great!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I struggle with mascara as I have hooded eyes and mascaras always seem to transfer to my brow bone area. This mascara does not! It stays put! I use two or three coats to get the affect I'm looking for. I love this mascara!

reviews.review_title: WORKS GREAT WITH NATURAL LONG LASHES
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Honestly this mascara is great, my favorite. It applies really nice and makes my lashes look like falsies. Keep in mind that this mascara is only useful with people that have long lashes. My mother and a few friends who had small straight lashes used it and absolutely hated it, it had no use for them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this mascara because I was impressed by the positive views on this website.  Most reviews showed 3 stars or better.  So, I decided to try it.  Well, I'm not impressed at all.  I'm over 54 (71 to be exact. Not shy about revealing my age) so my lashes over time have thinned or diminished.  So, I need all the help I can get.   I've been currently been using a drugstore make (l'oreal) and it's doable.  Not one mascara, high priced or drugstore one lasts longer than six weeks with me. That's because I need multilple coats to get drama I want.  I don't mind buying one more often if it doesn't cost much, but I do mind if it's $20 or higher.  So this mascara doesn't lengthen or thicken at all.  Just darkens them.  How disappointing.  So, I keep all my receipts and plan on returning it to the store.  I'll keep what i'm using now.  Maybe one day, I'll meet the mascara of my dreams.  I would not recommend for women of my age category.
I find it hard to apply without getting clumps.  Once on it looks great, thickens and lengthens, but prone to clumps.
Works awesome. Leaves lashes looking super thick and long without the clump.
Long-lasting, lengthening but natural looking product. My new go-to mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got a trial size of this mascara, and I fell in love the minute I used it for the first time. I have long but scarce eyelashes, this definitely did the trick. My eyelashes looked amazing, everyone thought I was wearing false ones. I went out and got the full size, but in waterproof.

I first had the non-waterproof version of this mascara and loved how it made my lashes look but it kept leaving black smudges at the edge of my eyes by the end of the day. I decided to try this waterproof formula and LOVE it. It lasts through everything: an hour of sweat-filled cardio, a seven hour music festival, even the beach. That being said it can be kind of difficult to remove, but I find that coconut oil does wonders. Would recommend if you're looking for a bombproof mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: makes my eyelashes thick and long, love it. My favorite mascara, worth the price and last for about 3-4 months.

I have very oily eyelids, and this is the first mascara that does not leave black smudges on my brow bone. I previously used the waterproof versions of Loreal Volumonous, Dior Diorshow, and Bare Minerals, and none worked like this one. My lashes also look thick and long without being clumpy. I will definitely buy it again!
Only my eyes are very oily. I have to use waterproof eyeliner and mascara if I don't want to look like a raccoon. I have used other waterproof brands and nothing works like this stuff!! Amazing!

The first day I wore this mascara, I had a really hard test and cried on my way home. When I got there, I took my anger out on my boyfriend and cried again. This mascara DIDN'T. BUDGE. When I looked in the mirror, I was expecting a mess, but it was as perfect as when I first put it on. I might be a bad person, but at least I have impeccable makeup. Seriously, this stuff is IMPRESSIVE.

I really like this mascara it is my favourite I got the waterproof one and it's pretty good it makes each individual lashes great and bigger I have tiny thin eyelashes so when I curl them it makes them great and when I put it on it makes it 3D! It so amazing but I never tried it underwater so I can't say anything about that. It's kinda hard to take it off (only using paper towel and water) I like it how I use the mascara on my bottom lashes it looks very feathery and not clumpy! I definitely recommend this

reviews.review_title: Not much more waterproof than the nonproof version
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: loved the nonwaterproof mascara and decided to grab the waterproof version for summer beach trips. It separates each lash, lengthens, and thickens. My lashes look natural and feathery and babydoll-like. Lower lash smudge is minimal to none, and I don't have to fight the mascara when I remove it at the end of the day. However, my only critique is that for a waterproof mascara, it does not dry as quickly like other waterproof mascara. I have straight, thick lashes that can't hold a curl for the life of me. So it's pertinent that I have a mascara that dries quickly to hold my curl, and those usually are waterproof mascara. Tip: swipe the thinnest first coat after curling, wait to dry, then layer more for optimal curly, feathery satisfaction.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I say it isn't entirely waterproof because I am used to curling my lashes and it staying with the curl when I use a waterproof mascara and this does not do that. They fall almost immediately, so if you curl your lashes and have shorter lashes this is not the mascara for you. The pros to this mascara is the brush is awesome and does separate your lashes and lengthens them, so I would recommend it for that. I just wish it dried quicker to keep the curl.

I absolutely love this mascara! I own both the water proof and original and I adore both of them. It is so easy to apply, perfectly even and no clumping! Curls and separates my lashes, leaving them elegantly long and lush. I am also a big fan of Too Faced Better Than Sex, which leaves a fuller, clumpier lash. I love the Buxom because it gives the opposite effect as the Too Faced, so I have a mascara for whatever look in going for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love that it applies smoothly without clumping! The lash brush is the best! It really does separate each lash.

reviews.review_title: Replacement for Anastasia Beverly Hills Clear Coat
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Devastated over losing my Anastasia Beverly Hills Clear Coat for lashes, I went in search of a replacement to make my naturally long, curled lashes keep their color where it belongs, rather than smudging onto my now drooping lid. Since I already LOVE the Buxom regular mascara, it was a natural progression to try the waterproof on top of the regular formula to seal the lashes. Ta da! It works great! I start with Dior lash primer, then go in with Buxom lash mascara, and finish with this. I get defined, separated, natural-looking lashes that look amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best mascara I have ever purchase. Stays on forever!
Love love love this product. Short & sparse lashes look great! Not heavy at all. Absolutely NO clumping. The brush is phenomenal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Usually I have to use 2-3 mascaras to get length volume and separated lashes but seriously this is all you need.

I always use waterproof mascaras because regular mascaras make my lashes fall flat. I curl my lashes all the time because they grow straight and downward. I was super excited about this mascara because of reviews I read.  I was really satisfied until my lashes began to fall flat pretty quickly. I was surprised because no waterproof mascara has ever done this before. So, the mascara formula is not good for those with lashes like mine.  The wand is big and is the best part of this product! Distributes the mascara very well, doesn't leave clumps and gives a nice clean look to my lashes.  I was totally let down by the mascara formula and was going to return it but I'm SO in love with the wand! It's the best I've ever used! I now use it with other mascaras and I tossed out the Buxom formula because it unfortunately wouldn't work with my lashes.

Best Mascara! Tried this after Urban Decay discontinued their Cannonball mascara at Sephora and this is my new go to! I think it is actually even better than Cannonball. Most mascaras make my lashes fall and lose their curl and this one does not! It makes them look as if I have false lashes on. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: The best waterproof mascara! I adore this product, it is now my daily mascara, it creates a great fanned-out look and works well for building volume without clumping!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have no idea how this mascara isn't a cult beauty product. Mascara is my favorite product, but I'm very picky about it. This mascara does it all: volumizes, lengthens, etc. Before discovering this mascara, I was always changing up which brand I used. After discovering this, I've repurchased it 3x and keep a spare just in case I run it. All mascara lovers must give this a try!

Best waterproof mascara ever. I wear it everyday and love the way it looks and stays put, even through a heavy workout. But, the best is how easily it washes off. Drug store waterproof mascara is impossible to remove, this stuff washes away with ease. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I feel like I have tried almost every mascara at Sephora at some point and I keep coming back to this one. It's super volumizing without being clumpy, which to me is everything I'm looking for. If you're looking for volume, try this mascara!
Best mascara ever! I've tried so many this is the only one that doesn't clump or flake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! Up until recently i had been using L'Oreal's Voluminous Million Lashes Mascara, but i decided to try this one and it is absolutely amazing! it doesn't clump and practically makes me look like i'm wearing fake eyelashes! I paired it with Benefit's roller lash mascara and it lasts all day, through sports and homework!
I love this mascara and have even bought it for friends as a gift. Which led them to their new addiction!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really like the brush on this mascara because it helps to separate and define my lashes. The brush has an hourglass shape similar to the better than sex one, but it has stiff plastic bristles. The waterproof formula really stays in place all day, but washes off pretty easily.

It wasn't as volumizing as I wanted.. To try to make it more volumizing and bolder- you had to appy it atleast 3x or more. So I applied it at 1-3x max- & my lashes drooped like I never even curled them- it was hideous. I really wanted to love this one but it was bad. It did a fairly good job with bottom lashes though, but I did have minor smudges by end of day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Defnitely separates and thickens lashes. I love this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This mascara is thin and build-able. Does not flake through out the day. I especially love it for the lower lashes.

I usually buy the waterproof mascara from Merle Norman, it's beautiful and looks very nice with enough drama. I wanted to try Buxoms mascara since I heard good things about it, bought it and pretty much love it, I still love my Merle Norman just because I don't get any flakiness with it and I kind of do with the Buxom one but still lived the drama and waterproof is a must for me.
Really volumizing, but I've had issues with flaking. However, this is still my go-to mascara.
Separates all of your lashes and gives great length!
Best mascara and amazing wand. Literally bought a mascara trial pack with about 10 top brands in it...this one made the cut. Even my daughter loves it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a great mascara, really like the shape of the brush.Works very well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using various mascaras for the last 10 years and i can honestly say this is the best yet. it gives great coverage and actually elongates and separates the lashes. Love this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This stuff really does extend my lashes, making them look fuller and longer. Unfortunately, I do get a bit of transfer underneath my eyes, even when I don't use mascara on the lower lashes.  I have heard some people complain about the bulky brush, but I find it easy enough to use.
My go-to mascara. The brush prevents lumps, and it goes on nice and smooth. I look for definition rather than volume as my lashes are already long. Perfect for me.

This mascara is excellent in that it does not smudge or flake. That was important to me since I have very oily skin and no other mascara stays on my lashes! It was also very easy to remove with my eye makeup remover. No rubbing, just a quick swipe or two. It gives good length to my lashes which are decent, but not great. It give a fairly natural look. The volume is not the best. I like the more natural look, so I'm ok with this. If you ate looking for tons of volume, this probably is not it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: It was waterproof and gave great length, however I spent a great deal of time cleaning up the clumps left on my lashes after each application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am a scuba diver and I do a lot of swimming and diving. This is the best waterproof mascara I've tried, and I've tried them ALL. I love to wear it for everyday. I really like the brush. It keeps lashes separate and it is very easy to get the bottom lashes. It doesn't take much to get very black, very pretty lashes. I am very happy with this purchase.

I felt the need to leave a review since one of the reasons I bought this was because it had such a high rating. This was my first high end mascara purchase and I was disappointed to say the least. I usually only buy waterproof and I will say this formula is great for that, but doesn't actually do much for my lashes. Mine are already pretty long and curly so I usually go for volumizing mascara and this was unimpressive in that department. I also feel like it fades/comes off really soon?? It doesn't smudge or give me raccoon eyes but I notice after an hour or so the ends of my lashes are lighter, as if if the mascara wore off. Waste of money; my drugstore mascara is waaaay better.

Best mascara I've ever used. It's long lasting and the dark pigment really makes my eyes pop. I have long lower lashes, and this is the first product I've used that doesn't give me raccoon eyes after a few hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Okay so first, I feel like if you're thinking about buying this mascara, the online photo does NOT do the brush justice. It is so full and the bristles are so fine and full, it is AMAZING. I decided to check this out in store (as I was on the hunt for a new daily mascara to replace my Better Than Sex) and I'm so glad I did; it definitely helped make my decision. I have pin straight lashes that are a decent length (I guess I would say mid-length) and when I curl them, they stand out and look great but the problem is that once I apply mascara, they fall flat again. Waterproof mascaras help but they're usually damaging to lashes during removal; this is NOT the case with this mascara! It's waterproof to an extent, but very easy to remove. The brush defines and separates my lashes for great length and surprisingly, good volume. This product is priced just right, in my opinion. I've been using it for about a week and I could not find any flaws - I love this mascara. I am even able to go over this with another mascara that's meant to build volume without any clumping. I am very pleased with this mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to daily mascara. It never flakes off, doesn't rub away, but easily washes clean in the evenings. It gives the perfect amount of volume and definition for daily/work wear. The curve of the brush lets me get in and get the corners of my eyes nicely without getting a bunch of junk.  It's a staple in my makeup drawer.
This mascara goes on perfect! It stays on all day and keeps my eyelashes curled!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the only mascara that doesn't smear on me. I've tried a lot of other major brands and had to return them. I always end up going back to Buxom mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the Buxom waterproof mascara! Perfect for a rainy day or truth be told, an emotional day. Don't have to worry about any mess at all or any streaks or running. It applies nicely, lasts forever, and leaves me lashes looking big and beautiful. A definite buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I purchased another waterproof mascara and by noon I had smudges on my upper eyelid. (I have deep set eyes.) I tried this one, and it is true to its name. A good mascara, and waterproof through tears!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have blonde eyelashes and always wear mascara, This mascara is probably one of my favorites. It makes my eyelashes longer, defined, and gives them volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: ....and I've tried a TON of mascaras, both high-end and drugstore brands. I have oily eyelids and very fine, straight lashes that usually get overwhelmed by most mascaras. I find that Buxom mascara is truly clump-free and smudge-proof and thickens lashes in just 1-2 coats, making it a perfect everyday mascara. It is lightweight enough to maintain a curl made by an eyelash curler and it separates my lashes. I highly recommend it if you're looking for a clean, polished mascara look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Pros: - Buxom lengthened my already quite long lashes even more. -It truly is waterproof, no raccoon eyes to be had at all. -I like deep, extremely black mascara, and Buxom definitely has that crazy, beyond-black thing going for it. -Held a curl VERY well, better than most mascaras I've tried.  Cons: -For me Buxom fell a little short in the volume department. I'd rate it at 6 out of 10. -Why on earth is the brush so darn big and cumbersome? I found it difficult to apply to the corners of my lashes, and continually felt like I was going to drop the brush. -No clumps, but I am noticing that the brush has now started to bring out a TON of product (much like how certain drugstore mascaras do after a while) so I have to wipe off the excess every time. Feels wasteful.  Overall, this mascara is average for me. I use it now as my weekend errands mascara, not my everyday go-to, and certainly not when I need some oomph and volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: LOVE BUXOM WATERPROOF MASCARA , THE BEST ! LOVE HOW IT LENGTHENS EYE LASHES WITH OUT ANY CLUMPS.IS VERY NATURAL LOOKING AND LENGTHENS YOUR EYE LASHES WHILE STILL LOOKING ALL NATURAL ! BEST EVER , HAVE THROWN ALL MY OTHER ,SOME ONLY USED ONCE OR TWICE , OUT .WILL NEVER GO BACK .IT LASTS ALL DAY AND WASHES OF EASILY . BUXOM MASCARA IS NUMBER ONE !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: It lasts and stays on pretty well. Does not smudge as much as other mascaras. Thickens and add volume but is not too spidery as a mascara. I like it and would purchase it again.
I have tried all the mascaras, it seems. This one is perfect. Lengthens and provides volume and is truly waterproof. Love it!

reviews.review_title: OK. But brush is not good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I decided to purchase this as it was listed in a product review website and listed as the best mascara buy. I would have to say it is fantastic waterproof mascara, that also washes off better than other waterproof mascara. However, the brush that comes with the product is not that great for me. I do NOT like the fact I would have to spend another 20 dollars to choose another brush option.the only great feature of this brush is that is does indeed lengthen lashes by miles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love Buxom mascaras and needed a waterproof version for my wedding day. It worked and looked great! A little drying for everyday use but great for special occasions!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! It makes my lashes look super long and thick. I can rub my eyes with it on and it stays put.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: For the most part I love this. I bought this solely due to thesweethome review that it was the best mascara. My only issue with it is that it clumps for me and therefore those clumps fall off on my face. I am giving it a 4* because it has been the best mascara that I have tried. It's waterproof and does not move in the water. I just wish it didn't clump when I was putting it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: i have stubborn short and straight lashes so i was looking for a good mascara to hold a curl and lengthen my lashes. this mascara weighs the curl down immediately, even though it did add good length. the bristles are shaped so that there is no clumping and every lash is coated which is nice, but i returned it as it is not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was so skeptical about trying this mascara. I absolutely love the original Buxom mascara in Blackest Black so I was afraid that the waterproof version would not have the same volumizing power, consistency, etc.  I am quite pleasantly surprised as to how much I love this! The consistency is the same as the original, in between a mousse and liquid. If you like dry mascaras, this is definitely for you. It's not clumpy and coats my short, thin, Asian eyelashes very nicely.  There's definitely more volume, but not length, after applying this mascara. I'm okay with this because the mascara doesn't claim to have lengthening powers. They separate pretty nicely, but historically I only like to put on one coat of mascara. I also have not tried it with curled lashes, so I apologize I cannot attest to the curl staying power.  What I am most impressed by is how waterproof this is! I wore this to the gym, only mascara, no eyeliner, foundation, primer, etc. After an hour and a half of intense cardio workouts, weight lifting, and cross-training, it did not budge, flake, or smear at all! I must admit that I sweat A LOT. I honestly have never met anyone, guy or girl, that sweats more than I do, it's pretty gross but weirdly impressive at the same time? My face was streaming and I was consistently wiping my entire face with my workout towel throughout. At the end of my workout, I checked the towel and no transfer! I looked in the mirror and it still looked perfect. I could not believe it.  This is the best waterproof mascara I've ever had and will definitely be repurchasing.

Defines lashes well, but provides no volume and completely destroyed the curl I had just put in my lashes! So disappointed. I'll be returning this and j sure hope Urban Decay Cannonball comes back in stock soon.

I'm a former drugstore mascara buyer. I never found the need to spend more than $5 on a mascara. That was until I received a sample of this bad boy at a rouge event last year. This is my secret weapon for flawless, beautiful, long natural lashes. I haven't used anything since I discovered this. I wear mascara a couple times a week so one tube lasts me about 4-5 months. Until I find something better (which will be very hard to do) I won't be switching anytime soon.
Bought this before going on vacation somewhere humid. It works great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have tried almost every mascara on the market and this one just surpasses them all. It has the ability to add volume, spread lashes up and out to make eyes look bigger. It brings out lashes you don't even see:-P It never runs and never smudges. I love this mascara! Recommend it to every woman I know!

I have naturally long eye lashes (sorry, not meaning to #humble/straightbrag) but they are not very dark. This covers them completely to the ends and doesn't clump! My pet peeve of mascara. I've been wearing this for 3+ years and don't plan to stop.(oh and yes, waterproof:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Went to the store looking for Blinc mascara but it was sold out. I was looking for a mascara I could use at the beach and wont smudge. This was a perfect mascara. Although it was great to give color to my lashes and define them it did not give me any volume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have always loved Buxom mascara, but always went with the non-waterproof version, because it is easy to wash off with soap and water. Then I started really pushing hard at the gym and it would run, I would have raccoon eyes. :) So I have since switched to this waterproof version. Which is awesome, I did have to go buy makeup remover too, as it is very waterproof! Love it and Buxom!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! I was desperately looking for one that would not only volumize but was also waterproof and long lasting. I loved the effects of Better Than Sex mascara, but would end up with raccoon eyes within a couple of hours. This has almost the same lengthening and volumizing effect, but remains in place all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara, it gives me so much length and volume! However without multiple layers it is not very defining so keep that in mind!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara. Always a go to. Use it everyday for my bottom lashes. I do use it on my top lashes some days, but it takes a few coats if you want a really deep black. But it goes on well and stays on all day. I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I purchased this mascara in an effort to find a long-lasting waterproof mascara that doesn't flake. Unfortunately, after a few hours of wear this mascara flakes into my contact lenses. The applicator is also cumbersome and bulky. On the plus side, my eyelashes do look full and thick. I will continue my search when I'm done with this purchase.

reviews.review_title: This is my HG waterproof mascara!!!
reviews.review_text: I have been searching for a paraben free mascara that works for years and now I have finally found it! This is really waterproof and it curls, lengthens and volumizes. I am a person with very watery eyes so a waterproof mascara is a must! However, most waterproof mascaras have parabens in it and my eyes don't react well to them,so when I found this mascara I found my holy grail mascara. I have used this product for months so I am sure about my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am 54 and have never had thick eyelashes. This is the best mascara to volumize and define my lashes. I use Lancome's eyelash primer then Buxom. Love it!
Really like the color and it stays on all day!

Although this mascara is really black, lengthens and separates with buildable volume...it took the curl completely out after I curled my lashes. I've been curling them for over 10 years now and one thing I learned is if you want the curl to hold-get a mascara that the first ingredient is NOT water!!! Even if it says waterproof and the first ingredient is still water-it will drag out the curl immediately!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a product that will stay on when you go swimming, working out, or in the rain this is without a doubt the best waterproof mascara I have ever used. It stays on in any watery situation without the unwanted black smear and circle under the eyes. The only downfall is it doesn't give much oomph at all. Aside from providing the black color it isn't anything special in terms of length or volume, but as far as what I bought it for (waterproof) it earns a good rating!

reviews.review_title: not as good as the regular formula
reviews.review_text: I'm a big fan of the regular buxom mascara and tried this one since summer is upon us. It's ok, but it was prone to clumps upon application so I found applying it became finicky. Back to the regular buxom and loving it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and pretty much always end up with smudges of mascara under my eyes, even though I only wear waterproof mascara. I also have sparse, stubby eyelashes, so I like mascara that adds volume, length, and separation. Finding all of those things in one mascara has been a major struggle, and I am so glad that I finally tried Buxom!  The brush is great; it's easy to get all the way down to the roots of the lashes without smearing mascara onto your lids. And the formula of the mascara is the best I've ever tried. It's lightweight, doesn't clump, and still adds a ton of volume and length. More importantly, it doesn't leave dark shadows under my eyes!
LOVE this mascara. thick and defining and yet lightweight and separating. highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This mascara is the best thing ever!! It is so easy to be able to dress it up for special occasions but also dress it down when you just want to give your lash a little extra. The waterproof works really well and it lasts all day and it takes FOREVER to come off but it is so worth it! 100% a staple to have,

I love this mascara! It doesn't smudge or run or hot days. I wouldn't try swimming with it because it might cause raccoon eyes. If you want a mascara you can wear all day and not worry about it smearing buy this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've tried three to four different mascaras from Sephora and didn't like them any better than my drugstore CoverGirl mascara I was using. This one is an exception, its lightweight and doesn't clump. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have short wimpy lashes & have tried several waterproof for my sensitive, watery eyes that I just haven't been happy with (MUFE, Clinique, Lancome...). I thought I would give Buxom a try and I'm so happy I did. It bulks up my lashes with just one coat. It doesn't wear off or end up as dark smudges under my eyes. I love it! I'm hooked!

reviews.review_title: Wish I had gotten non-waterproof version
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of the non-waterproof version last summer and was so obsessed with how big it made my lashes. I was also impressed with the staying power, even though it wasn't waterproof. I'm a huge fan of waterproof mascaras because I work long days and like the thought of it staying put without having to touch up. I really like this mascara overall, but the waterproof formula definitely seems to clump more than the regular formula, which is a bummer because I really love everything else about this mascara! I wanted to love it, but I think I may go back and get the regular version since it's not as clumpy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This has been my go to mascara for over a year! I live in Hawaii so I'm always on the lookout for a waterproof mascara that doesn't clump. I love this mascara but it holds up all day, even when I'm swimming/snorkeling beaching but yet easily comes off at night with my eye make-up remover. Also the price is very decent given the quality! I give it two thumbs up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to see this Mascara in the store, as I tried another Buxom sample and loved the Mascara...unfortunately, they were all sold out of the kind I wanted so I got this instead. Waste of money. No better than a $5 drugstore brand. Will not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I did my research like many of you probably are and decided to give buxom's mascara a try. I literally knew next to nothing about this brand before getting this product but I am sure glad I did. This mascara stays on all day, is super pigmented, and doesn't flake, clump, or smudge. It is extremely buildable and survives many dives into the pool. I've been stopped by many people who have asked me if I am wearing fake lashes when I wear this! Best feeling ever, and I typically only need two thin coats of this stuff. If you are still looking for a mascara just stop and get this one. My only request is for this mascara to come in brownish-black too whenever I want a more natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara for daytime. It adds just the right amount of volume and isn't too dark keeping it more natural looking, which is what I like for daytime use. I have never had any issues with clumping or flaking. But is you are looking for dramatic lashes, this is not the mascara for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Made for great long, thick lashes, but flaked so bad. Felt like there was sand in my eyes all day. The waterproofing element was perfect - came off w/o too much elbow grease, but stayed true with watery eyes. If it didn't flake SO bad I would buy it again, but that was a major issue.

I was so upset how much I hated this mascara. The brush is too huge even for just top lashes which makes the brush hit your eyelids and your nose and it's just so messy. It didn't add any volume or any length at all. I get much more amazing results from some of my drug store mascaras

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: So disappointed! Did not hold a curl, and simply gave me a skimpy, clumpy mess. Did not define, did not volumize, and worst of all, weighted down my lashes. Did not smudge.
Horrible máscara! It does last all day long but for people like me that have to use a curler it's not worth it. It brings my eyelashes down. The nor waterproof works amazing :)
This is my favorite mascara and I have teeny eyelashes so I definitely am in the market for BIGGER as well as water and smudge proof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is great for thickening and adding volume to your lashes. Not so much for lenghthening, but it definitely does a little something-something. I have long and thin lashes, so it's perfect. The only downside for me is that the brush makes a mess since it's so big.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: i've tried a lot of mascaras but I keep gravitating towards this one. If you are a heavy mascara wearer and tend to reapply several times, its perfect! Doesn't clump, run or flake and price is less than other brands. Try it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Not impressed with this and it makes me very sad. I have read all the reviews saying how great this is and I was so excited to try it. I tried wearing it to work every day this week and by lunch it had all melted off and got into my eyes. When you wear contacts, this makes for an incredibly uncomfortable day to say the least. For a $19 mascara, I expected more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a really nice waterproof mascara for me to be able to wear while I was teaching swim lessons in the pool. My sisters recommended this to me, and boy were they right! It might not be the BEST when it comes to thickening and volumizing your lashes, but it certainly gets the job done. It easily separates and defines each lash and definitely gives you a bit of volume. The best part is unlike other mascaras that claim to be 100% waterproof, this one actually is! Would not come off when I cried or was swimming in the pool, but I found that it comes off very easily when you want it to. unlike some other people! Love it, will definitely be rebuying.

This mascara just didn't do the job for me. I need more of a lengthening mascara and this is more for volume. Had to return it. Also, it is quite difficult to remove, so a really good makeup remover is needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This mascara was defintely hyped up. It was just OKAY, nothing special. The brush is cool, but you really have to be patient with it and layer a lot of coats to get a good amount on your lashes. I know this was waterproof but even my bioderma and oil cleansers had a tough time getting this off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This mascara is just average and does nothing for me. I don't know whether its just me or its the mascara, Therefore I gave it three stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! It is clump free and applies evenly on top and bottom lashes. I have tried plenty of high end and low end mascaras and this is my favorite! It's not a heavy mascara and you don't need to clean the brush off before applying (due to clumps). It's a great natural looking mascara and will buy more!

reviews.review_title: Amazing look, but a bit smudgy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. I started using it 4 years ago and have used it ever since. I have yet to find a mascara that makes my lashes look as good as Buxom does. Seriously, it gives volume, even coverage, and awesome length and definition. My one complain would be that it does flake and rub off a bit-- I guess my eyelids are a little oily and this causes my mascara to smear or rub off more than others. So I am hoping a clear waterproof topcoat will help with that while not changing the look. Fingers crossed.
I love this mascara! I have tried soooo many different kinds searching for one that is perfect for me. This is it!! It gives my lashes lots of volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: A sales person recommended this as a good volumizing and waterproof mascara. It's definitely volumizing but not overwhelmingly waterproof. I have allergies and often end up with this mascara underneath my eyes after a couple of hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been a big fan of Diorshow for years. But that is so expensive. This is a really comparable product for way less money.

I first got this mascara as a free sample and i bought a full size of it. I love it! It's quite expensive for a mascara but totally worth it. The formula is great,it doesn't clump your lashes easily and the brush gets in the lashes and coats them.perfectly. only downsize is the brush applicator is a bit big so you may have a hard time getting mascara on the corners of your eye. It's also perfect for the botton lashes. The formula is a bit wet so you it would be best to let it try a bit as it you may get mascara on your lids.  Also, i don't really throe my mascara after 3 months although that's what the experts recommend. I usually throw mine after 6 months and the formula is still good. Doesn't dry up on me.
Best mascara I've ever used!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Best mascara on the planet. doesn't smudge either!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Fantastic mascara that doesn't leave me racooned eye at the end of the day. I love the way the brush grabs every single one of my lashes. It does get a bit clumpy on the ends of the brush, and it is hard to get it all off at the end of the day. But usually, I just avoid the ends or wipe off any large clumps.
Loved the mascara, but wouldn't buy again. It works perfect for my eyes but after a few uses it starts to clump. I am now in love with the urban decay mascara, which works wonders!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have very long, blond lashes, so I'm always searching for the perfect waterproof mascara. I I don't wear waterproof, my mascara ends up looking like black eyes. This, while very good, isn't the best just yet. It does flake a bit, and it does smudge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Hands down probably one of the best mascaras I have ever used. I love this product so much. I have always had people telling me that all mascaras were pretty much the same, the only difference being the brushes, this could not be further from the truth. I've dried cheap drugstore brands and have found many to be too drying, wands to be just okay and I have tried mid and higher priced mascaras with similar results. I have tried a few mascaras including sephora brand that were so wet that the mascara was all over my face after application. I have very oily eye lids and usually need a waterproof formula and this mascara has not failed me. The formula is a little more on the wet side without being too wet. It takes a few layers to get up to the look I want and I am happier having to apply a few layers, then applying one and have it go everywhere. The wand is okay. I have small some samples of the buxom mascara in the gold tube with the leopard print handle on the wand and I've found that if I apply that mascara first (drier formula, better wand, but not waterproof) and then this mascara I get the perfect look!

reviews.review_title: does what it says it does
reviews.review_text: I'm a huge mascara fan, and after all the aves I've heard about Buxom, I decided to give a try. I must say it doe what it states. this mascara provides Length and dedication, not so much volume. Length yes!!

reviews.review_title: Beware if you have straight lashes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I generally prefer waterproof mascara because it helps keep my straight lashes curled. This mascara however, made the curl fall like a regular mascara would. This problem can be easily fixed by applying a waterproof mascara to the base of the lashes and applying this to the rest of the lash. In that way, this is a very good mascara. Great length and separation with absolutely no clumping. Its a little bit of a hassle to have to layer on a different mascara first, but overall I really liked the mascara

After reading the reviews I couldn't be more excited to try out this mascara. I have long straight eyelashes that refuse to stay curled so I went ahead and picked up a waterproof formula as those usually keep them curled. This formula however made my eyelashes fall straight. I was so upset. The result was hard flaky eyelashes that were clumped together. I really wanted to love this but just couldnt. I tried wearing it multiple times but it just wasn't working with my eyelashes. Sad to say but this has to go back, I feel like its also stinging my eyes. Not to mention my eyelashes get stuck to my bottom lashes too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I think my fave part about this Buxom mascara is the wand. It's curved and it really makes my lashes POP! Also, it's true to it's word with the waterproof. That's gonna stay put until you scrub it off with make-up remover. Doesn't smudge either! It's a keeper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have naturally long, full lashes, but they're brown so they usually clash with the eye shadows I like to wear.  This mascara is my favorite. It's waterproof and lasts all day rain or shine, but it comes off easy with makeup remover wipes at the end of the day. The non-waterproof version is nice, too, when I just want makeup for a short special occasion.  It makes my lashes even longer without making them feel weighed down or bulky. I get bold lashes that compliment my eyes, but the mascara isn't so heavy that I need to wear eyeliner to make it look good.  The brush is the best I've ever used--it separates my lashes and seems virtually clump-proof. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was on the search for a great waterproof mascara since my eyes water like crazy. This is the best I have found. Definitely out does the drug store brands. I still get some flaking from it on my lower lashes though but it hangs in there longer than any other considering the amount my eyes water.  The brush is awesome and it adds volume and length. I had a woman just today ask if I was wearing false eyelashes. A true black with very minimal clumping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got this mascara in a rewards box (one of the super nice 500 point boxes) but it wasn't waterproof. I much prefer waterproof mascaras, because I occasionally rub my eyes throughout the day and hate it when my mascara smudges. This stuff doesn't clump, it makes my lashes super long and thick, and it stays put no matter what I do. This of course makes it tougher to remove, but that comes with the territory of waterproof mascaras. The wand is perfect. The formula is great. For the price, it can't be beat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This mascara is a true black, goes on smoothly, doesn't clump or flake, and is truly waterproof. I've worn it all day at work, then to a spin class, and it does not move. I think it does a good job of defining and adding some volume and length, but is over pretty natural looking, which I like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara and get so many compliments on how long my eyelashes look when I wear it. The only issue is that I bought the waterproof mascara and IT really stays on then flakes the next day because it stays on well. Con to some PRO to others

I went into Sephora and asked a sales associate what product she recommended for volumizing and lengthening mascara and she suggested the Buxom, honestly I have never tried a mascara as wet and clumpy as this one. Paying 22$ for a higher end product, you'd expect a somewhat passable result but this product actually made my lashes look shorter! I would not recommend it to others. It could also be that the mascara just didn't work for me but in the end I still am quite disappointed in the product itself

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The brush is too big, picks up too much product, the product is thick and sticky gives me spider eyelashes and not a soft effect. If you want spider eyelashes, this product is for you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Just works to me, love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I feel like I have to swipe my lashes 20+ times to get it to stick to my lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love the way this mascara lengthens, separates and is waterproof. Just doesn't think as much as I'd like. I use a different mascara for the first coat and then Buxom waterproof for 2 more coats.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This mascara brush will give you long,lengthy full lashes without clumps or flaking. This is something i will buy over and over again. This is better than any other mascara that sephora has. Worth every penny :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this mascara because I thought that maybe, just maybe, this would have enough power to stand up against my oily skin. And not only did it do that, it looks amazing while doing it! This separates, lengthens, volumes, and gives just the littlest bit of curl. I use this everyday-this is perfect for a natural, long and luscious lash look. If you don't already have it, go for it! You'll be glad you did!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite mascara. The color is very black and shiny. The brush is large and it does an excellent job of defining the lashes at the most outer and inner corners which I sometimes have trouble with. I have somewhat long lashes to begin with, and this product defines them and makes them appear even longer. I feel that it looks best with darker eyeliner/shadows.

This is by far the best mascara I have ever used! I received a free sample of it by Sephora and fell in love instantly. While I prefer non waterproof versions better, I found that it would smudge too easily throughout the day . The waterproof version works just fine with me though. It goes on smooth and the mascara wand seems to pick up every one of my lashes. It just goes on beautifully! Will definitely purchase again. Maybe give non waterproof another try.
It did everything I wanted it to do in just a couple combs through my lashes! I was very surprised at how well it worked. It worked better for me than the dior mascara! Will definitely repurchase
I'm gennerally not a fan of mascara, because I hate the weird hard bristles and clumps. This mascara is perfect!! The bristles are so soft and flexable and i have yet to see any clumps.

Vain woman that I am, I wore this mascara to my half marathon, which could have been a really bad choice. However, this stuff did not budge. The finish line pics were incredible -- no raccoon eyes, smudging, or flaking! I couldn't believe it. Highly recommend!!!

Tryed to love it but,negative. . Irritated my eyes so much stinging& itchy ,flakes ,stright up liquidity had to apply multiple times just to get a good coating,not waterproof raccoon eyes after hard workout. No volume either. So back it went .

reviews.review_title: My FAV Mascara of the moment!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Doesnt smudge. Love the wand that is user friendly. Great full lashes :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Live this mascara, have been using it for five years! And will continue using it through our the years (:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I never wear mascara because I personally don't need it, but I have always wanted to try it and see how my lashes looked. Even though I had no idea what I was doing, the mascara was very easy to apply, and it didn't clump like another waterproof mascara that I had previously tried. It didn't make too much of a difference on my lashes, but mascara tends to work better on people with light colored lashes. Also, the mascara dried relatively fast, so my lashes didn't stick to my eyebrows, which was nice. It layers wonderfuly, and it is quite waterproof (splashed water on my lashes and tried to scrub off the mascara and it didn't come off!). I cry when I laugh and when I wear mascara I don't want to have to worry about looking like a racoon! I liked this mascara a lot and would recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am a bit disappointed in this mascara as I love the non-waterproof version! However this one is very clumpy, dries out way too fast and flakes off my lashes. Love the wand and the non-waterproof version, but this was a big disappointment :-(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: LOVE IT! Always have. I never buy anything else.

reviews.review_title: I found it. I found the one.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's lengthening, it's volumizing, and the applicator makes darned sure that there's no clumping. It's seriously a genius formula. It doesn't flake under your eyes (even the non-waterproof one doesn't flake) and I've had problems with flaking with other brands like Tarte & Too Faced. Plus, this formula is more light weight than Benefit's 'They're Real' so it holds the curl a lot longer into the day. This has got to be the most underrated mascara that's out there. Everyone needs this in their makeup bag!

This is the last waterproof mascara I will EVER buy! I am a total mascara snob/junkie. If I wear nothing else on my face, I wear mascara.  That being said, this stuff is amazing. I wore it when I was induced with my daughter and after 24 hours of hard labor and an emergency C-section, it had not budged. At. All.  More recently I lost my mother, my best friend. I didn't wear makeup to the funeral because I didn't want it running down my face. So I wore this mascara and a clear gloss. I cried buckets. Rivers. And my mascara didn't budge!  If this product can survive a traumatic birth experience and my mother's funeral, it can survive anything!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have tried a good amount of Mascaras, but I refuse to use any of them after I have used this product. Instantly, after just one swipe I see my Lashes double in size. Re-buying this because I can't live without it.

reviews.review_title: one of the best waterproof mascaras!
reviews.review_text: Lasts for ever ! Defines n lengthens my lashes wonderfully no grums not runny and just wonderfull overall, didnt dry out quick ! One of my faves! Will repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This stuff definitely lends volume to my thin little lashes. But it also, unfortunately, stays sticky for too long after application. I have to hang out and wait for the tiny prints on my cheeks to land so I can wipe them off before leaving the house — not awesome. Another complaint, though minor, is that the container is really fat. Barely fits with all my other stuff in my makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Without exaggeration, this really is the BEST mascara that I have ever used. I continuously try new products that come out but every time, I go back to this mascara because it is so much better on my lashes than anything else I've tried. It goes on smoothly, adds volume and lengthens. It is not heavy or sticky, nor does it clump my lashes together. It is just all around amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. I bought the mini first to try and quickly purchased the full size. I love the rubber wand and it not only adds volume but also length to my lashes. The brush also nicely combs through my lashes and i dont get any clumps. If you are interested in trying a new mascara I think this one should be a must try for any mascara lover!!!!
This mascara really is waterproof. The downside is that it does tend to clump and flake a little, not in the beginning but after about a month's use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Was great right out of the tube. Now a few weeks in it's clumping. It could be user error, but not sure.
Love this mascara. Doesn't clump. Wand is magical. Better than benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best mascara I have found that works on my thin, blonde eyelashes! I love love love it !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I searched and tried many different (high and low) waterproof mascaras without success. This one is a winner. Best part-- the definition and buidling ability, plus it actually comes off at the end of the day.

I like this but wish it were a lil' dryer, a lil' too much product comes out onto the brush. It is waterproof though and can be removed easily with warm soapy water. I like the plastic brush, good for separating, but I wiped it off a lil' onto a tissue before using.
This mascera gives a full lash look and lasts all day but it clumps a little for me. Just make sure you get an eyelash comb as well just incase it clumps.

I asked a sales associate for their recommendation for the best waterproof mascara. This was her recommendation. Sadly, I don't like it. It does not cover my eyelashes as well as explained. It also flakes off and does come off easily in water. Certainly not waterproof.

This mascara is impressive. It separates, doesn't clump, and stays on all day without smudging. (It's also easy to take off with makeup remover, unlike other mascaras I've tried.) I should add that I have thick, long lashes already and bought this to give them some life after my eye shadow and concealer made them a little pale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Hands down best mascara out there. I am an active outdoors person and this mascara always stays on never causing horrible raccoon eyes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a mascara that stayed on throughout the day and didn't smear under my eyes - for the first time in a long time I can actually say this one admirably rose to the challenge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: It separates and coats each lash and they look long and full. I love this stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love the length and fullness it gives my lashes and it truly is waterproof. I've tested that A LOT lately and this mascara has never failed me. No clumps, no spider eyes, just gorgeous lashes with this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Doesn't clump and makes my lashes look fuller.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes
reviews.review_text: I have tried soooooo many mascaras out there, and none of them work as well as this one. I have very thin, light blonde lashes, so finding a mascara that actually makes a difference is very challenging. I picked this up in the store the other day, thinking it was a brand that I had a sample of before. I got home and realized it wasn't the brand i thought, but turns out I love this even better. I love false lashes and for me, this almost creates that same effect. I also find that it lasts all day. I haven't tested how waterproof it is, but i'm sure its great! It washes off easy too, with a slightly vigorous rubbing. Please don't hesitate if you are like me and have a really hard time finding the perfect mascara. It lengthens my lashes while darkening them as well. Very natural, but noticeably different than not wearing mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Lengthens, doesn't clump or look fake, and does not flake or run. I have tried about every waterproof brand out there and this is #1 hands-down.

I love the depth of color and that it stays on all day. It made my lashes look thick but not long. That being said it is extremely hard to take off and my lashes get rubbed off more than the mascara... Not good. Soon I will have no lashes!! I wanted to guve it a real try though but I will be returning this and going back to my usual mascara
Way too heavy and flaky! Straightened my lashes and made them look spidery with just one coat, and I'd find specs of it on my far throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have a chronic issue with raccoon eyes and always had a hard time finding a mascara that lasted...until I discovered Bobbi Brown's mascaras. They gave me no raccoon eyes and worked well. That is until I received a deluxe sample of this. Not only does Buxon last all day, it also extends my lashes like crazy. Enough so, that other people noticed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: not waterproof. did not last more than 3h.
The brush is really big and bulky so I feel like it is hard to reach all my lashes without mascara getting everywhere. I've tried Buxom mascara in the past and love it but it had an adjustable wand.

I have long lashes but sometimes it's hard finding a mascara that does make them hold the curl without using an eyelash curler...this mascara did an amazing job curling my long lashes and lengthening them further :)

reviews.review_title: Buxom Waterproof has been a disappointment
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased this waterproof mascara on a trip to Sephora. Based upon upon the reviews I had read previously, I thought I would give it a try (particularly since there was a waterproof formula).  The mascara is thick and cakey and has been difficult to remove. It has, however, been waterproof. And I love the blackest black color.  I am going to stick with it until I run it out, but I won't buy this specific mascara from Buxom again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love Buxom products in general and I was happy with this one as well. It glides on nicely and really helps make my lashes stand out- they especially look longer. It does clump a bit but is still worth it for the money imo. It stays on all day and does great.

reviews.review_title: Is it supposed to be dry?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's quite possible the tube I received was older inventory. Regardless, the formula was dry and had to be returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Not stiff yet waterproof

reviews.review_title: Not a fan of the waterproof
reviews.review_text: I grabbed the waterproof one by accident and didn't like it. Buxom regular is my all time favorite mascara, but the wateeproof is almost impossible to get off. I even used makeup remover. My lashes were dried out and lost a few lashes just trying to remove it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with this mascara. I have trouble with mascaras as my eyes are very sensitive and usually after 8 hours my eyes burn and tear and it is running all over my face. It's not as volumizing as I would like but it works and I have not had a reaction to it so far. so it's pretty good. I'll buy it again. It's great for people with allergies or sensitive eyes like me.

I'm fortunate enough to have long, thick lashes already, so when I look for mascaras, I look to the brush to make sure its going to comb through my lashes instead of the other way around. The brush on this wand is great. For me, it does just what the box says and separates and defines every single lash. The waterproof formula is good. I get a couple little flakes coming off in the water, but no raccoon eyes! It also leaves my lashes looking and feeling soft and healthy. Based on what I've paid for other mascaras, this is a great bang for my buck, and without a doubt my new go-to waterproof pick.

I've tried a lot of waterproof mascaras...this one works the best by far ..stays on for more than 24hrs without a smudge..and keeps your lashes looking pretty...price is not bad either..there are other ones out there that are more expensive but dont work as good as this one....a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love the volume - stays on - makes my eyes more defined

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I do not get along with this sort of mascara wand, I think. I received this as a sample. It was dry and smelled funny, so perhaps it had expired/gone bad. Made my lashes clumpy and short looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I thought I'd give this mascara a try since I like the regular one so much. Honestly, I feel a bit silly because I don't feel like anyone really needs waterproof mascara and none of them are truly waterproof. I will not buy this mascara again mainly because it flakes all over the place. I'll wash my face and there will be black specks underneath my eyes. The waterproof just makes it extremely difficult to take off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I adore this mascara. I adore it even more that it's waterproof so I can wear it when it's rainy or I'm working out. This provides perfect length, definition and volume to my scrawny, pale, stubby lashes. Both formulas (waterproof and regular) work really well for me and I have super sensitive eyes and have never had any issues.
A friend gave me the waterproof buxom mascara to try and I love it I don't use anything else

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I think they've got the marketing all wrong. I never bought water proof mascara before because I never cared to have it on when I swam, lol, but what they should tell you is that this product never flakes and gives you icky dark smudges under your eyes when you wear it all day long. Only thing is you need a really good cleanser to get it off. The brush separates & defines my lashes in a way that makes me go, WOW! You can layer it for effect, but I find one coat is perfect for day wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this about a years and a half ago. Nothing compares to this product! I've fallen in love with the regular and waterproof version! This is my #1 staple product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love love love Buxom mascara. It's the best mascara I've ever tried. I do think I like the non-waterproof one a bit better, but they're both great. They make my lashes super long and dark. I haven't outright tested the waterproofness yet, but I'd love it regardless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am an aircraft mechanic and during the summer I have to work with no air conditioning. I sweat like crazy all day, yet I haven't had any mascara streaks. I love this mascara and it is the only waterproof mascara I buy.

This is an awesome mascara and I wanted this mascara to be the one but it fell short by just one key element: it does not lengthen at all. The awesome: zero clumps, separates and fans your lashes, thickens your lashes a lot while still looking natural. But my lashes looked super short which is rare for me. I would LOVE if Buxom kept this mascara as-is but also made it lengthen.
I work super long days so a waterproof mascara is a must. Unfortunately after I put this on it got very dry and started to flake. Unfortunately this mascara will not be a staple in my makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: For great looking lashes that last all day, plus it is waterproof.
I ordered this mascara, and today's the first time I tried it, AMAZING! It's waterproof, Lengthens and gives me major volume! A must try!
AMAZING!!! Doesn't clump or make lashes look spidery. Lashes are separated and look full. No need for tugging on your lids with an eyelash curler either because this mascara is PERFECT!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Most of the waterproof mascaras I've tried are either too clumpy or just give basic definition. This one is a good balance. I love the definition the brush gives my lashes, as well as the volume. It also comes off with eye makeup remover well, unlike some other waterproof mascaras.  The only downside I've seen is if you leave it on longer than a day, it tends to flake. However, I almost always take my makeup off at night, so it's not an issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this mascara for Christmas and I have to say, it is probably the best mascara I've ever owned. It lengthens, defines and seperates my lashes with no clumping whatsoever. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive eyes and oily skin so waterproof mascara is a must. I have been using Tarte but when Sephora was out I decided to give this one a try. Holy Moly! I love this mascara. I wear it over the Tarte primer and I get the blackest full lashes that won't flake or smudge yet easy to remove with my oil cleanser. My application tip for volume is to hold the brush vertically and apply it back and forth in a window wiper motion then hold it horizontally and wiggle at the base all the way up to the tips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this mascara. When I got a sample size of the regular Buxom mascara I fell in love with it but it flakes on me, so I was super excited when I found out there was a waterproof version. This mascara does a great job at doing all the things I want in a mascara but can never find from just one; volumize, define and lengthen. And it has a way of doing all of those things but still making my lashes look natural and like I was just born blessed with awesome lashes. I would definitely recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This mascara was so disappointing! Although I got the waterproof, it did not hold up to the humidity at all. It didn't hold the curl, and smudged after a few hours. To top it off it was pricy! Don't waste your money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: With this mascara all you need is two coats. If you use primer you will have flawless lashes.
This mascara is amazing. Just make sure you use an oil cleanser to take it off or your lashes will be pulled from scrubbing. Ouch

I have an eye disease which requires me to use prescription drops multiple times a day, so waterproof is essential for me. That said, it's really hard to find a waterproof mascara that is gentle for sensitive eyes. This one really takes the case. I was using Tarte before but I found the Tarte way too dry... This one lasts all day, comes off easily with a good waterproof remover but doesn't budge otherwise. Oh, and no raccoon eyes! Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: My first foray into non-drugstore mascara, and I will purchase again. Very happy with the lengthening, volumizing effect of Buxom. The brush rocks! I like the lack of chemicals listed; made me feel good about spending the next tier of $ on mascara! I recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Does not stick your lashes together. I'm very upset it is out of stock and I'm not able to add it to my order!

I had received this mascara in a sample set of mascaras featuring five brands. This one was the best and stood out the most. It adds so much volume and definition. It was also the least clumpy out the pack. So when I ran out of the small sample size I had to visit the store and pick up the regular size. Great mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have naturally long lashes, however they are straight as an arrow and I find it hard to find a mascara that doesn't weigh them down even more. I have used this mascara for 3 years straight and will not use any others! I have tried so many others because this mascara can be hard to find or is frequently backordered, but I always go back to this one. It does an amazing job of separating lashes, lengthening and curling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been using this mascara for the past 2 years and my eyes always look amazing. I already have some natural length and curl to my eye lashes, but when applying this my eyelashes just seem to stand out more. I don't even need to use a curler. And while it can be hard to reach the outer corner because the brush it huge, it never flakes or smudges and it is ture to it's word waterproof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Light skin tone
