reviews.review_text: I like this a lot; it really does define and lengthen. And it doesn't clump, run, or wear off. The only reason I gave it only 4 stars is that I think the tube doesn't last as long as I would expect for the size and cost. I usually throw out mascara after 3 months, as recommended, but this hasn't lasted that long with almost daily use....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. I've literally been on the hunt for a good mascara for over 3yrs when my favorite was discontinued by L'Oreal. This mascara is it!! It does not transfer (I have long lashes that rest on my eye area when my eyes are open) and this will not transfer! It last long and looks beautiful without looking all 'spider lash'. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my ultimate go to mascara. I have tried multiple mascaras and not one compares to Buxom just yet. I have long, fine, eye lashes that you can barely see. When I use this mascara my lashes triple in volume! It flakes and clumps very very little (there's no mascara out there that doesn't) and you can build it up as much as you want. I love combining this mascara with too faced BTS mascara then you really get that false eye lashes look! However, if I had to choose one over the other, Buxom takes the cake. BTS tends to irritate my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love it. Been wearing mascara every day for years, just got this one a month or so ago. It lengthens beautifully, and gives a heck of a lot of definition.  However, this is by far the best compliment I can give it: I put it on in the morning, at the end of the day my boyfriend says Your lashes are dark. That looks nice. 5 stars, just for that - impressive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: doesn't do much for volume but it separates each lash and lengthens them ridiculously...went out on a humid, rainy day and not one flake or hint of raccoon eyes. Washes off easily with water and face wash, no pulling at lashes to get it off...bottom line: if you need a good waterproof mascara, this is your HG.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Lengthens and curves my lashes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: LOVE this mascara. Is build able but doesn't clump up and fall off. Love that it is waterproof. Takes a little extra to get it off but that is good. So many waterproof ones take no effort to remove.

Have always used Estée Lauder Primer and Sumptous mascara. I have fine lashes and always long for that full lustrous look. In love with Buxom. No clumping, defines my lashes and they look fuller and thicker. Will def switch to Buxom. Was not difficult to remove.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: For years and years, I tried mascaras from drugstores to sephora to asian makeup online stores and never found a mascara that really satisfied me. But my search for the perfect mascara was over once I tried Buxom mascara. Combine it with an effective lash curler and you got yourself the best combo for outstanding lashes. The waterproof version is even better and my mascara stays put till the end of the day without any retouches. The waterproof is a bit hard to remove, so be sure to own an eye makeup remover. I've been using this mascara since 2010 and sometimes I try other mascaras, cause we never know, there might be something better than Buxom, but no other mascaras came close to Buxom's results.

reviews.review_title: Depends on What You're Looking For
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wasn't sure how many stars to give this. Defines and separates lashes wonderfully. Lengthens well. Volumizes poorly. Great points: doesn't flake, doesn't smear, doesn't clump. If you're looking for mess free definition, separation, and curl this is the product for you! If you're looking for voluminous lashes, you will probably want to shop on...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Because of my oily eyelids and my proneness to sweating, I've been looking for a good waterproof mascara. After reading so many good things about this one, I decided to give it a shot, and I'm really happy about it so far! It volumizes, lengthens AND separates, all while keeping your lashes looking natural. I'd highly recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This really thickens my lashes. I have long lashes so I don't need any length added even though it does add a some length. The trick is to go back and forth instead of up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive eyes and this mascara causes zero irritation. My lashes look longer, fuller and more defined. I don't walk out the door without applying it. And once a day is all you need. The formula is easily removed with eye make-up remover.
Love this mascara worth every penny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This mascara separates, lengthens, and doesn't smudge. I love the black pigmentation which is shiner and darker than other mascaras I've used. Best mascara I've used so far.
I think this brush is ideal combined with the mascara is perfect for applying a long lush lash

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I needed a volumizing waterproof mascara and this came highly recommended. I'm not a gigantic fan of it, but I don't dislike it enough to return it. It is a little clumpy and the more you work the clumps out, the 'faker' your lashes look, so I have to be careful how much I comb through my lashes or I look like a streetwalker for work. Great black color and definitely waterproof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love all buxom mascaras!

reviews.review_title: Perfect, long lasting and fuller eyelashes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot if different mascaras at Sephora and this one continues to be one if my favorites. It's long last, makes your lashes look fuller, and doesn't sting my eyes with my contacts. It's a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my daughter. Her lashes are outrageous when she uses this product! Her eyes just pop with this mascara! Gorgeous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my upcoming wedding. I am a fan of the regular version but wanted to test out whether it was really waterproof, so I wore it recently through a 7 mile run and a few hours at the beach after. It didn't budge! It wasn't as vibrant as when I first put it on, but I wouldn't expect that after hours of sweating and swimming. It didn't leave any smudging or marks! Can't wait to use it for my wedding :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! The brush is awesome and gives me big full lashes. Mine are just eh without mascara but with this stuff I have big wonderful lashes!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've tried many mascaras, most recently Dior Diorshow Blackout Waterproof. About a year ago, I decided to try a new mascara when I noticed Diorshow flaking off throughout the day. I tried Buxom Lash Waterproof and have been using it ever since. Admittedly, I use a LOT of mascara each day, but this mascara doesn't flake off or clump on my lashes. I've had a number of people ask if I'm wearing fakes because my lashes end up looking so long and full. I even got my mom to start using it, and she loves it now too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have very light eyelashes and blue eyes that are a bit sensitive to extremes of weather, that lead to tearing...so I stick to mascara that is waterproof. I've tried many, many brands from the cheaper ones to the more expensive and luckily found this one recommended to me at my local Sephora. The brush is great, it separates the lashes and the color is luxurious! I really love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have always had sensitive eyes and since I recently had LASIK surgery my sensitivity has increased. I tried several drugstore products that are for sensitive eyes but that all ended in failure. After some research and the suggestion of the beauty representatives at Sephora I found this wonderful gem!!! Big full lashes that last all day without smudging and best of all is kind to my super sensitive eyes!!! I plan on using this stuff for awhile :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I usually use the original formula, but I took a recent trip to Florida and wanted to make sure my makeup would stay put with all that humidity and rain. Needless to say, the first 4 days I was there it poured! And my mascara looked flawless (: does the job! Very nice waterproof mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Buxum mascara has been my go to for every day looks and it never disappointed. I was ecstatic to see it made into waterproof. To my dismay, I find formula to clump and flake more than the original. I have not gone back to the original since my use of the waterproof so I'm not sure if it's a complete revamp on the formula but I do miss the smooth applications I had in the past. Skip this one imo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I do like this mascara. It does not clump and can be removed easily and without pulling your eyelashes out. I do find that you need to apply this mascara several times and be patient when applying, it does not cover your eyelashes easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Its a nice mascara and DOES NOT COME OFF. The bush is extremely large which doesn't really work for me. I love the amplified lash by buxom 10 times better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite waterproof mascara! I love how smooth and clump free it goes on. Doesn't flake at all, even after rubbing my eyes. Makes my lashes look curled, full of volume and length!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Great brush. Good separation. Does flake after a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The shape of the brush makes it easy to apply. It lengthens lashes. Coats them very well. Can even use the brush on the bottom lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara, and now it's the only one I wear. The first time I put it on, I noticed it doesn't really make your lashes look super thick or long, but the texture is great, not clumpy at all. Also, it never smudges, even if you sweat or sleep with it on (which I often do!)
The wand is too fat and does not grab lashes. Makes them clumpy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love Buxom! This made my lashes look fuller and longer. Very chic with lots of va-va-voom! I've been caught in the rain with it on, and even worn it while suffering a bout of watery, allergy eyes - and no running or smudges! The true test will be a dip in the pool (which I have yet to attempt).  As with all mascaras, when you've been using it for a little while, the little formula particles start to separate out. Simply wipe it off of your mascara wand before applying and you shouldn't have any probs. Or use your lash comb to dust it off your lashes.  Oh, and I should add that the mascara lasts all workday long without running in my eye and/or eventually starting to sting. I have very sensitive eyes so that's important to me.
Disappointing look on the lashes. Flakes and clumps when Only used for a week.

Love this mascara! The brush seems to pick up just the right amount and distribute evenly while keeping lashes nicely defined. Creates a nice natural full looking set of lashes. My lashes seem to be staying healthy as well!
Nice brush, not clumpy. Doesn't hold the eye lash curler curl, but lengthens.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Excellent on water proof and oil proof, can stay all day long and won't smudge at all. The brush is resilience sort of like rubber quality, very easy to apply and control, can separate lashes one by one. Favourite!

Deep black, lasts through 100% humidty and 100 degree heat in a Mexican jungle hiking without smearing or budging. No raccoon eyes, not even when crying and no smudging. Comes off easily with watrproof makeup remover. Love the brush - lengthens and doesn't crumble or flake either. Volumizes too.

So I bought this mascara because the original Buxom lash mascara is said to be amazing. I never tried the original formula because I only buy waterproof mascara. This mascara didn't really do anything for my lashes but the worst part is that it flakes like crazy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was so happy when the waterproof version of Buxom came out. Its brush is the best!

reviews.review_title: Never runs, never flakes, never leaves you!
reviews.review_text: I have over 20 mascaras, and have finally found my forever! I have always had issues with flaking and/or running mascara, often without the lengthing that I was looking for to begin with. This has great lengthening, and I have not had issues (even after the overnight-sleeping-in-the-makeup). Still looks great!
Ive used this for a few years now its a little high priced but great product. Im not sure if I like this or they're real mascara better.
It's hard to find a good waterproof mascara. This one provided definition, volume and length. A little touch with a curler and its even more fab!
Really like Buxom Lash mascara and now it is waterproof! Worked well, survived a half-marathon! Does a good good job separating the lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I typically use the non waterproof Buxom and wanted to try this. It's a great waterproof product, never leaves any dark smudges and comes off easily. It doesn't have the same luxurious look that the non waterproof one does. So if you are looking for the look, use the regular, if you need a good waterproof one, this is it.

I usually get this in the non-waterproof version, so I purchased this accidentally. It doesn't seem like it makes my lashes quite as thick and long looking as the regular one, but it creates a pretty natural look. No clumping. It doesn't make my lashes brittle like other waterproofs I've tried in the past. I haven't worn it out in the rain or anything, but my eyes sometimes water from allergies, and this stuff stays put. I think next time I'll check the package a little more carefully, but I like it enough not to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I would recommend the Buxom Lash to anyone who likes a dark black volumizing mascara. If you're looking for fuller, a little longer, dark lashes, this one is for you. And they don't lie, it is waterproof!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Doesn't clump. Goes on smooth and gives my eyelashes both length and volume.
I LOVE this mascara! Goes on easy, is waterproof and yet removes easily.
It's okay. Not my favorite. Doesn't make your lashes stand out or dark enough. Don't like the shape of the brush. I won't buy again.

Finally I have found a mascara that makes even my short stubby lashes look long and full! The fact that its waterproof to boot is fantastic. This is my new mascara for the times that I dont feel like wearing false lashes.

reviews.review_title: Good mascara for us thin-lashed girls
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a mascara that would help with my short, thin lashes, but also not flake off and still be present at the end of the day. My previous mascara dried out so fast it was unusable and didn't help. I've been really happy with this one so far. It helps add volume and length, and stays on all day even though we're in the height of Cedar Fever here in Texas and I am probably rubbing my eyes all day. It also lets you build up layers pretty well with minimal clumping.

I have used mascaras of every brand from 5$ to 40$ buxom is the best bang for your buck! It doesn't smudge and my lashes look longer and beautiful! I was even asked if they were really my lashes! (I have very thin short lashes naturally) but with this mascara I have long beautiful lashes that I have longed for! I have used this product for 3 years now and It's my final choice!!!
I have tried every mascara out there. This one gives long, full lashed that do not flake. It is the best mascara out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this mascara! It goes on evenly, giving you full coverage without feeling heavy or looking clumpy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Best mascara EVER! Absolutely love this product and recommend it for every girl!! You NEED this mascara in your life. Seperates each lash beautifully.
Considering the price, other mascara isn't too bad at all. A little clumpy on the wand but is long-lastinbg and goe on smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the brush on this mascara. This product really defines my lashes - could not live without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: My new favorite mascara. It makes my lashes look bigger and fuller. Only down side is the formula does get kinda thick after a couple weeks and can clump. All in all a good product

Not only does this mascara make my lashes look longer and thicker than ever, it also has the most magnificent wand I have come by! I first true this product as a sample and I have been hooked ever since, truly worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have had many years of switching up mascaras looking for the perfect one. I seek volume, length, definition, and non-clumping and Buxom Mascara has given me all of it. This is by far my favorite mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: searched long and hard to find the right mascara that works for me. got this as a gift from my friend and it was love at first use! long-lasting, my eyelashes get so long, so curly, so thick, best mascara I've ever used!

reviews.review_title: not as good as non-waterproof buxom lash
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Argh . . . I was so excited when they FINALLY created a waterproof Buxom Lash. But the waterproof version just doesn't have the same hold and definition as regular Buxom Lash. It's heavy, so it pulls out the curl, and it flakes and smears after a few hours of wear. I had freckles and raccoon eyes by the end of the day.

This mascara glides on beautifully and is absolutely waterproof. So it won't deposit dark product from ur top lashes the your under eye area (which is why I pursue waterproof mascara. And it doesn't clump when applying multiple layers which I have found to be the case with many waterproof claims. And it washes off nicely with proper make up remover. 5 full stars for living up to its name :)
I love the Buxom Lash Waterproof Mascara. The formula goes on smoothly and the fat brush really separetes and coats each lash.

I love this mascara, it gets every lash. I was afraid the size of the brush would be too big and make a mess, but that's not the case. I like it so much more than any of the flawless definition mascaras.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! It's not clumpy, separates my lashes, and lengthens!
This mascara goes on without clumps or sticking, and doesn't wear off throughout the day--it's the best one I've used to date....and I've tried SO many different brands!

This is one of my favorite mascaras - waterproof but comes off easily with soapy water. I like the brush better than any other (second favorite is dior iconic) because it separates but really covers. This was a repeat purchase

Definitely has the volume but absolutely no staying power when it comes to the curl. I use an eyelash curler and it was almost as of the weight of the mascara lost the curl I had. It did feel comfortable with no irritation or drying as I feel with some mascaras which is important since I'm a contact lens wearer. I did not find it to be great at separating my lashes.

This mascara is awesome! It truly is waterproof and stays on all day long! The brush is slightly bigger than you'd like so I do have to be extra carefully when applying or I get mascara on my lower lids unintentionally. That's probably is it me. The mascara is the BEST. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: In all fairness, I didn't intend to buy the waterproof version of this mascara. The sales associate directed me to it and I didn't look at the box. I have used the non waterproof version and love it. I can attest to the staying power of this mascara though. My normal makeup remover wipes will not take off this mascara and I have to resort to cold cream, which can be a little messy and gets in my eyes. Usually I reapply after a few seconds to get that extra curl and volume but this is too clumpy to do that very well. It doesn't go on as smoothly as the normal version and is too difficult to remove, but if you swim a lot or need a waterproof mascara for some reason, this may be for you.

I adore this mascara. Something about the shape of the brush and the sturdiness of the wand make for a winning combination. Don't let the large ends fool you, it can reach even the tiniest lashes at the corners without making a giant mess on your face. Not to mention it really does make for giant, pin-up worthy lashes.
Just as good as the regular version only waterproof, and it really is. It had to be cleaned off with makeup remover, but I wouldn't have my water proof mascara any other way!
didn't hold curl in lashes, also flaked off onto under eye area.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I always get compliments when I use Buxom mascara. Since moving back down south, I switched to the water resistant and it is fabulous! Goes on smooth, dries fast!
I tried several brands and others in this line but I keep coming back to this one. It makes my eyelashes look very thick.

reviews.review_title: It’s not the worst but it’s not the best.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift and was excited to try it because I love the Buxom lipsticks. Unfortunately it seems my expectations were too high. It’s definitely waterproof (it’s difficult to take off with makeup remover) and it does last all day but that’s about it. It doesn’t separate it clumps and it flakes. I wouldn’t buy it because it doesn’t seem worth it for the price. I still like the Buxom brand but I think I’ll stick to their lip products instead.

I love this brand but was frankly disappointed. I've been using the standard Buxom mascara for a couple of years, and was excited that they came out with a waterproof version, but it goes on clumpy and is drying. Not a fan, sorry. Back to the original.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I like this mascara because it definitely lengthens my short asian lashes. but it unfortunately flakes and the brush is too big for my eye shape. Pros - Lengthens, holds a decent curl, black, waterproof, build-able. Cons - Flakes, hard to get off without oils, brush is too big and awkward for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I just got a free sample of this with my beauty points and I couldn't be happier! This is probably the best mascara I've ever used! My eye lashes look so long, but they don't clump and they don't look fake! I'm definitely going to buy this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is definitely comparable to Benefit's They're Real mascara, but the only differences I see is that this is more lengthening than volumizing. I also love how the Buxom mascara comes in waterproof. :)

reviews.review_title: Didn't think this mascara could get better...
reviews.review_text: I was wrong. This mascara is awesome. No raccoon eyes and beautiful length.
This is the best waterproof mascara EVER!!! I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I usually buy cheap ($7-10) mascara but got tired of clumps. Finally I got fed up and made the switch to a better product. This mascara is fantastic: doesn't clump, easy to apply, stays on forever. I would recommend this to everyone looking for a good waterproof mascara for a reasonable price.
Made my eyes burn and water. It's going back.

reviews.review_title: I Don't Like Being A FLAKE!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a product that I literally have been waiting forever to buy. Every time I would go into Sephora I'd ask if Buxom had started making a waterproof yet. I've been using the regular Buxom Mascara for a few years...and LOVE IT! So as soon as a recieved notice that it was coming I jumped...even ordered it online so I'd get it before it hit the stores. What a disappointment it has been! From the first application this mascara has flaked. All throughout the day I have to wipe my cheeks off to get the little specs of black off. Now, don't get me wrong...this is truely a waterproof mascara. That part works good. AND, I can get most of it off with soap/water...although I use Sephora's waterproof eye makeup remover (LOVE). The next tube I get I will be going back to the original Buxom Mascara and hope that my allergies don't kick in and I'm left looking like a racoon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite mascara. It does everything. The only flaw is that the brush is so big the mascara sometimes gets on my face.
I love this mascara! It defines each last, stays on all day and it doesn't clump. One of the first comments I got the day after I purchased was, your lashes look so long today. I LOVE this mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: In recent years, I've had issues with mascara bothering my eyes, making me feel like my eyelashes or pieces of mascara getting into my eyes. This mascara does not do that at all; it feels normal on my eyelashes and the waterproof formula hasn't smudged so far! Definitely makes my eyelashes darker and stand out!
This mascara is a good choice for lashes that need volume and definition and, add to that, waterproof! If you have been searching for a great product, try this one. Buxom comes through again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am bananas over this product! I have tried the gamut of mascaras out there, my most favorite being buxom lash; alas, it was not waterproof, and I moved on to something by Dior. Then this product came out! The brush by itself is brilliant - it defines and coats every. single. lash. And it's waterproof! I'm not sure if it's like I-went-swimming-in-the-ocean-and-my-mascara-didn't-budge waterproof, but it doesn't leave me with raccoon eyes at the end of the day like all non waterproof mascaras.  And so, I am in love!

I tried this mascara because I like thinner, somewhat liquid formulations and rubber-bristled wands in my mascara. I have a tendency to tear up pretty easily, so I also prefer my mascara to be waterproof. I liked the Buxom Lash Waterproof because the brush sweeps easily through my lashes and doesn't really clump for the first two coats (although with three or more coats, things get a little more clumpy and spiky than I would like). It's great at lengthening my lashes, although it doesn't provide much in the way of volume. However, the main reason I am not keeping it is that it is not as waterproof or long wearing as I had hoped. I was able to remove some, though not all, of the mascara in the shower without using any cleanser or makeup remover. Additionally, and this is the main thing that bothers me, it flakes pretty easily. After several hours, my cheekbones are covered in little flecks of mascara, and touching my lashes leaves me with black pieces on my fingertips. Because of the flaking, the lengthening effect is diminished by the end of the day. I wish that this provided a little more volume, and most importantly, didn't flake off all day. I'm still hunting for the perfect mascara for me, but this would be alright if you were only looking for length and didn't need it to last all day. Not my favorite, but it wasn't radically disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been waiting for this mascara to come out. I hate waterproof mascaras because they usually break my lashes off and i hate the way it feels but i must use waterproof mascara because my eyes are so geasy. I really like this version. It doesn't hurt my lashes and it has been great so far. I have worn this during these hot months and so far i'm really pleased. Next up, I'm going swimming with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was sooo excited for Buxom to release a waterproof version of the original Buxom mascara. I have straight lashes and only waterproof mascaras can hold the curl from eyelash curlers. I have the original non-waterproof version, and while I really enjoyed how great the brush works and how well the formula builds up, the inability to hold a curl made me hope for a waterproof version.  The brush is exactly the same and the overall tube design is the same -- minus the LASH under the BUXOM. I think the image posted is of the original Buxom mascara. The waterproof mascara tube has a shinier black finish.  Well, this product is not waterproof. Perhaps it could possibly be considered water-resistant? Not only could this mascara not hold a curl, but I was able to remove fairly easily with cold water.  On the plus side, the formula of this is blacker than the original.  I rarely ever return products because since this product claims to be waterproof but isn't, I will be returning this.
